review_content: Pours clear golden yellow with a white and pretty large head. Malt aroma with grainy notes. Taste is mild and malty but finishes with a nice touch of crispier flavor of hops. A straight forward but well balanced and refreshing brew. (0,33 l bottle @ PRG airport lounge)
Uit het blik. Ruikt pils, iets bitter. Smaakt bitterzoet. Frisse bitterzoete afdronk.

0,5l bottle from Edeka, drinking on 17/07/2021 BB 07.06.2022 Pours crystal clear gold with good soapy white foam on top and ok lacing. Aroma of malt, grains, hoppy. Taste is sweet malt and slightly bitter and spicy hops in the short finish. Maybe not too hoppy for a czech pilsner. Light body and texture, slightly watery and moderate fizzy carbonation. A bit flat and delicate but overall fine and easy to drink, goes down like nothing. Nice one.

Pours a typical golden yellow, decent thick head although goes quickly
Bitter aroma
Taste hoppy bitter  
Mouthfeel a little watery, medium carbonation
Bitterness stays into crisp aftertaste, light malty notes
Not much complexity
330ml Bottle, Tegut Darmstadt  Germany

On tap at the Black Horse, Leicester on 27-Jun-2021. Clear pale coloured beer with a medium sized white head. Aroma of crystal malt and hops. Medium body and carbonation. Slightly creamy mouthfeel with taste of grain and malt. Moderate bitterness. A decent lager.
Nice Saaz in a can. Mild, floral, classical hops. Malty and elegant. Slightly bitter aftertaste, still ”bready”.

500ml (5%) at home on 29 May 2021, purchased 24 May 2021 (bb 7 Apr 2022): hay, cereal aroma, pale golden amber, cereal, grain, malty flavour, grainy texture, moderate carbonation, dry malty aftertaste.

Poured from 500ml bottle at 5.0% abv. Aroma: Straw, crackers/biscuits, Saaz hops, slightly spicy and sweet. Appearance: Pours clear golden yellow with medium, foamy white head and heavy carbonation. Taste: Starts off sweet, some bready malt, decent level of hop flavour, slight citrus, moderate bitter finish. Mouthfeel: Light to medium body, slight oiliness, smooth foamy head, fizzy carbonation. Overall: Very enjoyable standard pilsner, best served ice cold on a summer's day. Pairs well with spiced meats, seafood, fish and chips, pizza.

Light malt and hops￼ aroma with a cereal and earthy and floral aroma. ￼ The flavor has a lot of cereal grain flavor that seemed too distracting for me. It was lacking fresh Saaz hops flavor with the floral and spicy notes from that I would expect from a beer￼ like this.￼

Can from an M Preis in Südtirol, drunk after a lot of driving to get here. Medium gold filtered, pretty good lasting head. Spicy lightly sweet-grain-fields nose. The flavor is a bit flatter than expected, lightly malty and mild bitterness. Bit of a candy like taste. Loads better than the non-original American crap Bud; nevertheless I expect that Budvar was better before it got big.
Aroma of malt and rice. Golden in color with amber tint. Taste is a darker malt with some earthiness. Kind of reminds me of a light version of a black lager
zapach delikatny, kolor złoty, o smaku trudno cokolwiek powiedzieć, jakiś tam posmak lagera był nic więcej.

Zapach delikatny, przyjemny, trawiasty / a faint yet pleasant aroma, grassy / niska, trwala piana / thin, lasting foam / świeże w smaku, wyraźne słody plus delikatna goryczka / fresh in taste with malts and delicate bitterness at the finish / klasyka / a classic one

Aroma: Malty and grassy. 
Flavour: Malty and fruity sweet. Aftertaste is sweet and lightly bitter. 
Colour: Amber with a white head.

Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień w celu uzupełnienia profilu na RateBeer.

Pours a typical golden yellow, decent thick head although goes quickly Bitter aroma…

Nice Saaz in a can. Mild, floral, classical hops. Malty and elegant. Slightly bitter aftertaste, still ”bready”.

Light malt and hops￼ aroma with a cereal and earthy and floral aroma. ￼ The flavor has a lot of cereal grain flavor that seemed too distracting for me. It was lacking fresh Saaz hops flavor with the floral and spicy notes from that I would expect from a beer…

Aroma of malt and rice. Golden in color with amber tint. Taste is a darker malt with some earthiness. Kind of reminds me of a light version of a black lager
zapach delikatny, kolor złoty, o smaku trudno cokolwiek powiedzieć, jakiś tam posmak lagera był nic więcej.

Zapach delikatny, przyjemny, trawiasty / a faint yet pleasant aroma, grassy / niska, trwala piana / thin, lasting foam / świeże w smaku, wyraźne słody plus delikatna goryczka / fresh in taste with malts and delicate bitterness at the finish / klasyka / a…

Aroma: Malty and grassy. 
Flavour: Malty and fruity sweet. Aftertaste is sweet and lightly bitter. 
Colour: Amber with a white head.

Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień w celu uzupełnienia profilu na RateBeer.
Instagram/czgr_

Pours a perfectly transparent, translucent dark golden. A couple of fingers of a thin white head that quickly recedes to a layer. Fresh, clean and relatively strong aroma shows a cereal malts base, prominent fresh grassiness, a lemonish, slightly cedary twist and the slightest spicy/prickly hint. Taste notes as per aroma, though a bit less bright, with cereal malts sweetness taking perhaps a bit too much space (at least for my liking and especially with such vibrant, aromatic hops). Medium to light sweetness and medium to light bitterness, with none standing out in both taste and aftertaste. Most pilsners have a slight bitter, dry edge in the finish, but this one does not. Ligh to medium bodied with average per style carbonation. It's a prickly kind of carbonation, which makes the mouthfeel lively but still easy. Definitely an enjoyable pilsner, with a very good quality/price ratio.
Bottled. A golden to amber pour, crystal clear, with a short-lingering, snow-white head. Aroma is mild bread, iron filings. Taste is dry, bitterish, medium crisp. Medium-lasting finish.

Bottle. Saaz hops hits the nose right upon opening., some pale malts as well. Clear gold color. Flavors similar to aroma, mild malt, bready and lightly sweet, with gentle bitter tracks. Nice Czech aroma and hops do dominate. Heard that in Czech this beer is not considered a pils because the IBU are too low. In any case, I like this about as much as I do Pilsner Urquell.

Can tested.

Pours cloudy golden with a thin white head.
Floral with some citrus and malt to the nose.
Floral, herbal, and cereal with honey and caramel notes. Medium body with low carbonation. Nice roundness on the palate and well balanced. Finishes sweet with a clean aftertaste.

Go to lager with Pilsner. Draft taste better tough.
Old rating from 2011 - 500ml bottle, pours clear golden with a white foamy head. Aromas & tastes of cereal, grass, flora, grain & malt. Moderate body. Dry clean moderate bitter finish

From 0.5l green bottle in Leipzig, Germany. Pours clear golden with a 3-finger white head. A thin head, but one that still leaves a bit of sticky residue on the glass. Sweet, almost orange, aroma and flavor. Nice balanced hop bitterness. Mouthfeel is on the light side of medium. This is really delicious and I could enjoy this again. This is certainly not the American Budweiser.
Aroma 6. Appearance 4. Taste 6. Palate 3. Overall 12. Malt and slightly grassy hops aroma. Similar taste, with a hint of sweet at the beginning and of bitterness at the end.

Sweet malt with an apple and grape vibe going on in the aroma, after pouring a clear pale gold with a big frothy white head. There’s an initial crispness to the mouthfeel, which softens a little, the flavour being predominantly sweet and fruity, with a grassy hop bitterness in the finish
Barva svetlejsi zlatava. Pena stredni, malo trvanliva. Chut sladova, nizka horkost, suchy "rakousky" konec. Trochu dokysela. Velmi lehke telo. Proste lager.

0,5l Can from local market.

Pours light golden yellowish color with thick white head. Sweetish bitter taste. Medium carbonation. Drinkable but weird feeling on finish. Okay Czech lager. Enjoyed it.

Korektno pivo, malo gorči, vrlo pitko

Gyllengul och klar vätska med ett fint vitt skum. Brödig, gräsig doft. Stram och ren i smaken. Inga utsvävningar i onödan, bara rejäl tjeckisk bira. Neutral beska och en intill perfektion matchad maltsötma.

Buy in Konzum. 4xpacks cans 0,5L. Originl packages from C.Budejovice. OMG ! What a heavenly beer. What a beautiful mouthfeel, and suptile hop profile. Water from this beer is amazing. This is so amazing,tasty and drinkable lager. Smell is so piquant and you just want to drink it and drink it. Just one more word.Best lager in the world !

Classic czech Lager, typical grassy weedy smell after opening & characteristic dark golden colour, tastewise its ok to drink but trimmed to a mainstream beer with no "ecken und kanten" seen ofently in kiosk or späti. A beverage u can do nothing wrong with in doubt. Maybe more delicious below 7 degree fresh from fass in czechia. Id prefer urquell instead.
Can from Systembolaget. Golden with a medium white head. Bread, some perfume and light hops. An easy to drink one.

L’originale lager ceca dal profumo bello maltato e il colore dorato, con una schiuma fine e poco persistente. Il gusto è ben bilanciato tra i malti e le note luppolate grazie ai luppoli cechi Saaz, mentre il finale è secco e leggermente amaro. Una lager leggera dal corpo medio e molto gradevole da bere.
Found out of bottle. Pours a straw yellow with airy white foam. Light aroma. Better than average for the style.

Oct 2020. 330ml green bottle, filtered, from BeersOfEurope. Little whiff of light-struck hops on opening, but faint and soon gone. However, it does seem daft in this day and age to persist in using green bottles which offer little protection for the hops. This is a professionally made pale lager. Soft sweet malt with a little flutter of hops. It's actually not bad. If looking for a quick thirst quencher of a hot day, this would slip down better for me than many modern craft lagers and lager and lime style beers. Pleasant, clean, inoffensive, and quite tasty for a global pale lager. [2.6] 
 
Aug, 2004 Bottle.  Head to Head with Bud. Pale yellow appearance. Pale malt aroma - very light. Just beat Bud on both counts, but only by a fraction. Honey in nose, honey in flavour. Bud initially more flavoursome, but the Bud vanishes quickly and turns watery. There’s not a lot between the two when both are cold, but the Budvar just pips the Bud in all areas. [2.0]

June, 2002 This has a hint of butter that I enjoyed, but otherwise is way too laid back for me. [2.4]
No tak mniej więcej można sobie wyobrazić czeskiego koncerniaka, choć trzeba przyznać, że diacetyl i srednioniska goryczka sprawiają , że jest do wypicia😉

Clear golden.
Aroma is malt, saaz hops, grass. 
First is bitterness, malty, nice balance. 
The original and the best.
0.33 l bottle. Golden color beer with medium head. Aroma of malt, herbs. Taste is sweet, malt, hop.

Really impressive beer for the style. Nothing annoying. The aroma is smooth and give you many malts. The taste is sweet and very smooth and make the mouthfeel great. The beer is refreshing and dangerous drinkable. The carboration is very soft for the style. The finish leave you some kind short bitterness.
Overall i really enjoy this beer. Decent chose for the summer
Piwo jasne klarowne o żółtej barwie piana biała drobnopęcherzykowa pozostawia lacing. W aromacie delikatny słód i przyjemne masełko. W smaku dosyć wytrawne, chmielowa goryczka.
Smells grassy with a hint of citrus. Tastes good. Refreshing, crisp, clean. Ticks all the boxes for good lager. Very enjoyable.

09.06.2021 Aromat lekki chmiel trochę czuć, ale niewiele słodowe troszkę, jabłko
Złociste klarowne, biała piana duża,
Smak słodowy chmielowy nawet goryczkowe, nie jest takie bez smakowe.
Nagazowanie duże, orzeźwiające lekko średnia treściwość, finisz gorzki chmielowy
50 cl. dåse. 5,0 %. En af de fantastiske svetle pivo fra Tjekkiet. En god læskende og letdrikkelig øl
Sweet juicy lager. Boy Budweiser have a lot to answer for. American crap... This is the original and it's 10x the beer. Fantastic session lager, perfect for summer.

Butelka 0,5 l. Piwo złote, klarowne. Pina biała, obfita, średnio gęsta, trwała, z bardzo ładną koronką. W aromacie nuty ziołowe, słodowe, chlebowe. W smaku półwytrawne, lekko wodniste, ale ma świeży smak, wyczuwalne ziołowość, słód i chlebowość oraz lekki diacetyl i lekka ścierka, finisz goryczkowy. Pełnia niska, wysycenie wysokie, goryczka średnio niska, ziołowa podkreślona. Typowy czeski koncernowy pils, ujdzie w tłoku, dziwne, że nie miałem go wcześniej w ocenach.

Aroma of herbs, malt, bread. Semi dry, slightly watery, flavor of herbs, bread, malt, slight diacethyl and wet rag, bitter hoppy finish. Light body, high carbonation, low to medium bitterness. Typical Czech pilsener.
Kolor złocisty wpadający w pomarańcz, piana taka sobie, skromny lacing. Aromat słodowy z lekkimi akcentami owocowymi. W smaku słodkawe z lekką goryczką. Rześkie, dobrze pijalne.

Clear golden color with high white head. Aroma: malt, caramel, sweetness. Taste: sweet, malty, just a thin hoppy line. This is a disaster and a sad story, used to be benchmark for all good lagers, not any longer. Where are the whole cones hop - poloranny zatecky cervenak they promised. I am not gonna try this any time soon.

500ml bottle BBE Apr-21. Clear gold with a decent white head which lasts less than a minute leaving lacing. Aroma of hops, grain, grass. Moderate to low carbonation with a fairly smooth body. Taste of light malt, grain, a little sweetness. A mild bitterness throughout. Nice.

Can at home picked up from Tesco. Had this many times before but nice to see it in can. Aroma is nice floral leafy hop, clean pils grains, hint of biscuit and straw. Flavour is composed of semi sweet, clean pils grains, spicy hop, light metalic note, lagery apple,  pretty clean. Palate is semi sweet, semi crisp, moderate carbonation. Good lager.

Pours a clear, deep golden coloration with a large, fluffy, lasting head. Smells of doughy, slightly grainy malt and grassy, floral hops. Taste is a good balance of doughy, grainy malt and grassy, floral hops, with just a hint of a certain, hard to define, fruitiness also coming through. Finishes with a medium bitterness and some grassy, floral hops lingering in the aftertaste. Smooth mouthfeel with a medium body and carbonation.

A rather nice Pilsner that is perhaps a little bland, but well-balanced and easy-drinking, with a crisp and dry character, good bitterness and even hints of a certain, fruity berry note. What I like about this is the grainy aspect of the malts, preventing this from becoming too sweet and the grassy hop presence somewhat outweighting the floral one, as well as that very subtle, slight fruitiness.
On tap in Prague. Darkish golden with a white head. Aroma and taste of bread, some grain, Saaz hops and citrus. Not so bitter. Fresh and easy to drink.

Piwo idealni klarowne, z białą pianą. W aromacie ziołowość, przyjemnie chmielowe, ale w tle czuć taniego lagera. W smaku lepiej, piwo wytrawne z ziołową chmielowością wysuwającą się na pierwszy plan. Delikatna słodowość w tle.

Beautiful clear gold. white head that sticks around.
simple grainy, grassy, herbal aroma.
taste is similar.
i go on and off this pilsner. it comes in crates, unlike staropramen, so its usually better

Złotej barwy, klarowne. 
Piana biała, drobna, dosyć trwała.
Aromat głównie słodowy.
W smaku słodka nuta i ziołowy, goryczkowy finisz.
SKÅL, CHEERS, SALUT, KIPPIS, YAMAS, L’CHAIM, PROOST,  SALUTE, KANPAI 🍻🙏😎

W aromacie: skunks, piwnica, słód (zbożowość), żelazo i lekki karton. Smak wytrawny, słodowo-alkoholowy. Pełnia średnio niska, ale to typowy eulorager, więc nie dziwi, że trochę wodniste. Wysycenie średnio wysokie. Goryczka niska, trochę łodygowa.

# 1903; 3/2020. Grainy and herbal aroma. Gold and briliant body. Medium body, malty, grainy, herbal, strange sweet, slightly skunky, sour finish. Poor bohemian pilsner without good bitterness. 0,5 l, green bottle, market, Pilsen (Bohemia, CZ).

0,5l can from Billa in Central, Bratislava.
F: big, white, long lasting.
C: gold, clear.
A: malty, bit bready, bit caramel, spicy hops.
T: medium malty base, bready, bit grassy, caramel touch, quite watery for what it is yet clean taste, drinkable, medium carbonation.

Crystal golden yellow color with good white head, solid lacing on glass. On nose malty and grassy smell, malty taste, sweet and small amount of bitterness, high carbonation, medium body. Very good czech lager, i like it.
Pale yellow pour. Malty nose. Sweet, a bit hoppy, refreshing. Mediocre lager
Belle apparence, pas de nez, bonne pils rafraîchissante mais sans grande envergure.

Aroma: Typical for a pilsner, nice refreshing zesty smell
Appearance: Golden with a nice level of foaminess to the head, very clear
Taste: Great in general, rather than starting with a sharp bitterness and becoming sweeter throughout the tasting it has a consistent level of bitterness throughout with a rounder, more sweet flavour than many other lagers
Mouthfeel: Classic beer with a good level of carbonation and a smooth/creamy foam
Overall: Delicious easy drinking beer, great on hot days or with spicy food, 4.7/5

Vor Jahren mal im Stadion getrunken, da fand ich es total wiederlich. Nun habe ich eine craftbier Box geschenkt bekommen. Und da war das Budweiser eben mit drinne. Ich muss sagen do kommt die stadionplörre von der Wm 2006 nicht annähernd dran. Sehr gutes Lager mit einem milden Geschmack.

Słomkowe, klarowne, ze średnio obfitą, dość szybko opadającą pianą. W zapachu nuty słodowe i biszkoptowe dominują, trochę kwiatów i ziół w tle. W smaku półsłodkie, lekko mineralne, mocno słodowe, goryczka dość niska, ale długa, ziołowa. Średnie do wysokiego wysycenie.

Niby nie ma wad jako takich, ale profil zbyt słodowy, brakuje chmielu jak na pilsa.
Trawiasty aromat, smak wyraźnie słodowy, słodki, lekko karmelowy. Zauważalna goryczka przykryta słodyczą. Złota barwa, bardzo klarowna.

Golden clear with a thin head.
Smell of traditional hops. Hoppy taste with a lack of sweetness. Medium carbonation.

Oko: nieporównywalnie ciemniejsze od Amerykańca (może z 5 EBC). Piana obfita, ale też nie utrzymuje się długo.        
Nos: nawet jest chmiel! I szmata.       
Usta: Trochę goryczy, słodowość. Nieprzyjemny posmak.

Golden color, medium white head. 
Sweet malty aroma. 
Taste is super malty, sweet, very typical czech lagerish...perfect moderate hoppiness, well balanced mouthfeel. One of the best everyday czech lagers, stunning.

330ml bottle. Crystal clear, orangey golden colour with average, thick, creamy, half-way lasting, minimally lacing, white head. Minimally strawy, pale malty aroma with a malty spicy touch, grassy hoppy overtones with whiffs of citrus here and there, a touch of weed and silage. Taste is pale malty with a minimally malty spicy touch, slightly grassy and minimally citrusy hoppy overtones, a cautious touch of lemon, woodruff and peppermint. I have to admit, I'm a bit surprised about the fresh hop flavours - I'm not sure if I never recognized them before or simply forgot about them.
Pite jakiś czas temu, stąd brak szczegółów tylko ocena przeniesiona z notatek...
Notas de trigo, pan blanco y lúpulos nobles. Intensidad media, tanto en nariz como en boca. Escasa complejidad.  Final dulce suave con un punto amargo. Poca persistencia. Se bebe bien.
Een degelijk Tsjechisch bier. Een fijne witte en grote schuimkraag op een helder bier. Tien keer beter dan wat de Amerikanen er van gemaakt hebben.
Hoppy Aromas. Golden beer with a small foam crown. The taste is sweet hop tasty. Light honey aroma. Relatively weak carbonized. Easy to drink, tasty
Pours Gold and clear. White foam. Nice. Almost doesn't smell. Some malty echoes. Not too much gas. Nice grain. Better bitterness. Herbal.
its just drinkable but i dint really enjoy it. smells at first after nothing and has then a quite strange aftertaste, i would not buy a 2nd can

Malty richness and refreshing after taste.
Kind of simple beer but very balanced and good with any type of food.
One of my favourites,can 0.5l,cold. Great aroma with sweet flavour and a bit bitter aftertaste. All in all great beer for it's price

09.10.2019Złote i klarowne. 
Biała piana. Niezła. 
Prawie nie pachnie. Jakieś słodowe echa.
Nie za dużo gazu. 
Niezła zbożowość. Jeszcze lepsza goryczka. Ziołowa.
22.10.2020
Klar złoty. Biel piany. Sztywnej, z drobnych bąbelków. 
Aromat kwaskowo słodowo chmielowy. 
W smaku nawet pełne. Słodowe, lekki kwasek. 
Chmielu za mało – goryczka symboliczna. 
Musi świeże, bo smrodku od nasłonecznienia brak.
Riecht hopfig. Goldenes Bier mit einer kleinen Schaumkrone. Der Antrunk ist süßlich hopfig. Leichtes Honigaroma. Relativ schwach carbonisiert. Einfach zu trinken, süffig
I've been drinking this beer for a long time, so I'm just taking this here to keep it written
Vaahto kohtuullisen paksu ja pysyvä. Väri kultainen. Tuoksussa hiivaa. Maku ei ole mitenkään persoonallinen. Makeutta ja kukkaa ja hedelmäisyyttä on havaittavissa. Perus hyvä lageri.

Blind test - 25 koncerniaków.
Wygląd: Barwa złota, klarowna z niską, drobno i średnio pęcherzykową białą pianą, która szybko całkowicie znika, brak lacingu. 
Aromat: Trochę sztuczny, estry jabłkowe i gruszkowe, lekki diacetyl i utlenienie. 
Smak: Do składowych z aromatu dołącza nuta słodowa, chlebowa. W ustach półsłodkie, treściwość średnioniska, wysycenie niskie. Goryczki brak. Finisz wytrawny, słodowo - diacetylowy.
Smuk gylden lager med en fin skumkrone. Let bitterhed og en god humle smag. Lidt svag fylde.
I have always had a problem with Buvar. It is not bad beer, but it is totally uninteresting and boring. No bitterness, no drinkability. I am trying to avoid it if I can.

04.09.2019, butelka
Aromat słodowy, dość czysty, z lekką siarką. Smak słodowy, lekko ciasteczkowy. Nasycenie średnie. Goryczka zaznaczona, ale bardzo krótka.
Can from CZ. Tastes like pale malts, dough, and grassy hops. Light body and low/medium carbonation. Smells like dough, pale malts, and grassy hops.
Clear gold color, thick foam, but diminishes in a couple of minutes. Mildly hopped aroma. Well-carbonated. Malty and pleasantly hopped beer.
Pours clear gold with a thick white head. Aroma of acerbic malt. Taste has lightly hopped sweet malt notes. Palate has slight floral elements. A cheap beer made to a much higher standard than others.

50 cl bottle (BBD 2019-12-12), bought from Waitrose, drunk at home 2019-08-14.

Appearance is a clear pale amber with a thick dense off-white head that slowly dissipates. There's a moderate amount of visible carbonation. Standard lager appearance but a more attractive colour than usual.

Aroma has plenty of cereal with a hint of honey, and some lemon and floral notes too. Quite nice if nothing unusual.

Taste is good. Nice malty backbone with some herbal hop bitterness poking through at the front. Little bittersweet at the finish too.

Palate is fine. Medium bodied, nice amount of carbonation in the mouth and a good medium to long finish.

Overall, first time having Budvar and I'm a fan. Would like a little more malt in the aroma, but this is a good pilsner.

14-AUG-2019, draft @Skaal, with Erik. Thx. Erik:-)
Clear golden, low white head. Flowery hops and hay. Average body, a little oily, soft carbonation.
Złocista barwa, ładna, obfita piana, długo utrzymująca się. Aromat głównie słodowy z delikatną ziołową nutą chmielową. W smaku również słodowe, dość pełne.

Can @ Shelter w friends/Whiskylogen. Appearance: pours cleargolden with good white soapy head and lacing. aroma/taste: barley, bread, straw and floral and light herbal notes. palette: medium malty aroma, average carbonation, medium body, average sweetness, balanced by a medium bitterness, average duration and a watery texture. Overall: ok pils
Golden amber color with medium to high white head. Hop aroma. Malt hop crisp with a bitter from low to none.
Robe blonde pâle surmontée d'un beau col de mousse blanche. Jolie Pilsner en bouche, rafraîchissante et bien équilibrée.

Bonus Market  23 lei - 0.5 l
 Aroma ușoară de miere, hamei . Gust slab de malţ, porumb şi puţin citrice . Un bun euro pilsner
Barwa jasna zlota. Piana sednio obfita. Aromat slodowy. Smak slodowosc. Goryczka wysoka. wysycenie ok
Very rich and smooth beer, lacks a tad of kick and can go flat quite fast. Very filling and gassy also.

My kind of Pilsener light refreshing the malt and hint of citrus balance each other out.
Is there a better mass produced summer pilsner ? I doubt it
Cerveza industrial de estilo lager, de sabor a cereal suave y agradable. refescante
Bottle from systembolaget. Pours a golden colour beer with a medium head. Malty and sweet with notes of grass and citrus. Dry finish.

On the tap is better than in a bottle 

The aroma is grass, malt, a little sweet.
Taste malty with bitter.

not the best czech Ležák!
Best of pilsner’s. Beautiful color. Light and enjoyable. Far away my favorite.

I buy this beer now and again, very enjoyable.
Golden colour and rich thick head, Not bad.
A csehek egyszerűen nem tudják  elrontani a söröket,nagy masszív hab,szép szín,nagyon selymes komlós íz.Egy nagyon jó láger,ebben sem csalódtam.

Frothy off white head soon left a creamy collar & lacey cover on a pale golden body.
Faint malt, floral & lightly hopped aroma.
Medium bodied, lively on the tongue with a soft cloying back.
Corn, light citrus, faint hops, grass, biscuit & bread tastes.
Dosyć przeciętny wyrób, lekko wodnisty, z niską goryczką. Piwny smakosz raczej nie doceni, ale takiego Lecha, czy Żubra to kładzie na łopatki.
Klar lys gylden med hvitt skum. Aroma gress malt brød. Smak malt korn brød humle. God søtlig malt, lett god bitterhet. Smakt mai 13
Bottle at home from CoOp, in garden, 19th May 19, ready for this after cutting the hedge.  Aroma is true to the style,  taste is clean, some yeast, citrus, nice bitterness.  Good
Clear golden color with off-white head. Aroma has caramel, hay and malt. Taste is malty with some noble hops in the aftertaste. Flavors of caramel, malt and hay.

Aromat słodowy, przynosi lekkie chmielowe orzeźwienie. 
Smak dosyć lekki. Słodowy z lekkimi chmielowymi przebitkami. Z czasem dochodzi lekki posmak zbożowy. Jak na duży browar to całkiem, całkiem

A bottle from Jason's near NCCU. Aroma: very fresh yeast. Appearance: very inviting, clear golden amber, one finger off-white head. Palate: light-bodied and slightly astringent, rather fizzy out of the bottle, reliably bitter finish. Taste: medium bitter, good workaday fare.

Wielu ludzi krytykuje to piwko, a ja uważam że jest na prawdę świetne. Bardzo dobry lager. Taki do wypicia na codzień, przy grilu czy podczas spotkania z przyjaciółmi. Lubie się napić IPY cz APY ale to raz na jakiś czas. A tak piję Budweisera. Polcam
Bottled after work. Clear golden with white head. Fresh, crisp with bready malt, fresh cut grass, some herbs too. Well Balanced.

Ładna, biała piana. Klarowne i złote. W aromacie "niemiecko"-  mokre zboże i słód pilzneński. Goryczka niska, słodkie, ale nie w nadmiarze. Mokry karton, brak masła. Pełne, jak na koncerniaka to całkiem niezły pils.

Bottle from Waitrose 5% ABV. A good, refined Pilsner. Typical lager colour and white head. Fine honeyed malt flavour and pleasant floral hop notes. One of the best Pilsners available. Quality is consistently good.

Kolor: Złoty, klarowny. Piana: Biała, obfita, drobnopęcherzykowa, szybko obrączkuje. Zapach: Lekko słodowy, dosyć czysty. Smak: Lekko słodowy z nutkami ziołowymi, goryczka niska. Wysycenie średnie, ciała niewiele, ale czego się tu spodziewać. Może być.

Achetée à Casino Hypermarchés (Villedieu-les-Poêles) DLC: 07/10/2019
Nez de céréales, de maïs et de houblon
Jolie robe blonde dorée translucide et légèrement pétillante
Mousse très légère
En bouche c'est une bière rafraichissante qui goûte vraiment la céréale, le malt et une amertume de houblon qui arrive plus tard le tout suivi d'un petit ressenti piquant en fin de bouche.
deep clear gold pour.  Grain and toast forward but with none of the skunk that accompanies a typical Budweiser.  Crisp and clean if a little boring.
İçimi çok kolay ve Amerikan Bud gibi şekerli olmayan orijinal Çek Pilseneri soğuk içilmelidir.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji. W celu uzupełnienia profilu
0,33l bottle. Pours clear golden with white head. Aroma is floral, grassy, slightly skunked, grainy. Taste is also somewhat skunked, grainy, sweet. Refreshing, but the skunkedness is a drawback.

Good and really satisfying. But I'm not sure if it's the best pilsner out there - bitterness isn't that strong, taste is mostly bread and grass with a rich malty aroma. Hops in the finish. 
Sometimes overpriced, but a good thing to drink when on sale.
Mycket god klassiskt pilsner. Mycket skum och frisk smak. Passar till kryddig mat.

Слаба арома, курцу није, типичан лагер. 
Пјене, нема уопште, екстремно сам разочаран.
Купљено у Роди у Чачку, пио сам сам у соби док сам причао са засновани и црвенотаблетирано Павлом. 
Изгледа као типични лагер, провидан. Боја мокраће. (Не свиђа ми се.)
Укус је бољи од типичног Србског лагера. Има мало сладак укус (хмељ). Јако питко, и освежавајуће.
Све у свему, пиво ми се свиђа и допада.
Сипано из флаше у чашу.
22.2.2019. @ 19:30
Its a very good lager, like all the things a lager should be from a country and brewery where it was invented. I bought this for my dad, he likes lagers. It was very good.
Klarowne, jasne. Pianka ok powoli opadająca. Dobre tanie piwo. Lidl proponuje je za 2,50 zł. Orzeźwiające ale nie do posmakowania. Pianka nadrabia za smak hi hi hi.

Cerveja de boa aparência, de cor amarelo dourado, de boa formação de espuma, com boa formação de colarinho, de aroma leve, de paladar agradável, bem encorpada, leve amargor e com toque de acidez ao final. Boa pedida para o dia-a-dia, e também para os amantes de cervejas leves como o pilsen e/ou  Lager. Embora tenha uma briga sobre o nome Budweiser, estou do lado da Czechvar. Merece todo o meu respeito.
Slušně udělaná dvanáctka. Aspoň na rozdíl od většiny českých průmyslových pivovarů má toto pivo poctivé suroviny, a to se doopravdy cení :)

Lata. Coloração dourada. Espuma de boa formação e retenção ok para o estilo. Aroma de cereais frescos com um acorde de maçã. Sabor de biscoito com uma nuance residual do amargor. Aftertaste amargor agradável. Leve e muito refrescante.

Bottle. Clear light gold with a decent foamy white head. Aroma of grass, grains and spicy and herbal hops. Taste is malts, grains, herbs, a little metaland an earthy bitterness balanced by a moderate sweetness. Medium to strong carbonation. Always nice to revisit.

Cerveja dourada muito bonita e espuma de boa formação. Essa Bohemian Pilsener apresenta um visual bonito aroma característico do estilo. 
Sabor de maltes biscoito levemente mais amargo
Boa cerveja para o estilo.
Ognie słabe, da się wypić ale żadnej satysfakcji czy przyjemności. Nie polecam.

Der Klassiker wird unter anderem in den tschechischen Railjet-Zügen gezapft zu 34Kronen/0,33l verkauft. Das halte ich schon mal für einen sehr gutes Preis/Leistungsverhältnis für einen Speisewagen.
Das Bier ist ein klassisches Helles, das aber einen leichten Metallgeschack hat, der aber nicht widerlich wirkt, da das Bier derartg süffig ist, auch wenn es ein bisschen warm wird. Es hat Charakter was man ihm als Industriebier zugute halten muss und ist weitaus besser als das amerikanische, brutal auf Drinkability getrimmte Pendant.
Ein gutes Bier wenn man einen Klassiker sucht.
Не водянистое. С выраженной горчинкой. Вкусно. Лучше жигулевского - факт. Разница в цене в 40 рублей не критичная.
Sto puta bolje od svih hrvatskih lagera... ništa posebno, ali je za razliku od ostalih puno puno bolje...

Złote, klarowne, piana średnio obfita, drobne i średnie pęcherzyki, zostawia szczątkowy lacing, dość szybko się redukuje.
W aromacie słodowe, nieco skunksa, nieco estrów. 
W smaku czyste, słodowe, nieco mineralne, odrobina estrów i chmielu na finiszu. 
Lekkie, dobrze pijalne. Goryczka jest, niska do średniej, dość długa.
Klassisk smag af tjekkisk øl, med en anelse sødme og fin i humlen. God øl fra kilden.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.

Green bottle poured a clear golden amber with a small lasting white head. Aromas of bread, skunk butt and spicy hops. Palate was light bodied and crisp with a dry finish. Flavors of bread, spicy hops and light earthiness with a crisp dry finish. BTW the new format for entering ratings really, really sucks!!!!

11.2 oz bottle. Smells a little malty, like a lager, no off scents. Pours crystal clear with a tinge of orange/amber. Tastes a little malty, fairly smooth. Clean, crisp finish. Would be a good lawnmower or summer beer. Nothing really strikes me as exceptional about this beer, but it is smooth and easy to drink. Also must add that it is much better than most all big commercial lagers here in the US.
Orange color, big foam size. Good beer, aroma and taste fit into the style.

Color amarillo dorado con tonos cobrizos, cristalina. Tres dedos de espuma con buena retención. Aroma y gusto en la misma línea, a malta pils y lúpulo Saaz, inicio de trago dulce y final amargo, muy equilibrada. Cuerpo acuoso. Puede que no sea la mejor Czech Pilsner, pero para mi lo tiene todo dentro del estilo y le tengo mucho cariño, birrón.

Capovane v Budweiser Cintorinska.Pena smotanova dlho vydrzala a kruzkovala.farba zlatista cira.Vona je chmelovo sladova.Chut jemne nakysla,sladovost chmel a chlieb.Telo je prazdnejsie.Dochut je intenzivne sladova s dotykom chmelu.
Can from local Tesco. Golden color. Big white head. Just an "eurobeer" (europivo). Little finish
Decent beer , it has a light carbonation , a sweet taste and it is easy to drink.
Cerveza de carbonatación media y cuerpo ligero. De su aroma destaca la malta y cereal. Una vez en boca es amargo pero poco agradable. Hay mejores opciones dentro de su precio y estilo.

Goldene klare Farbe. Große Geste Schaumkrone. Erfrischender Antrunk. Sehr viel Kohlensäure. Sehr hopfiger Körper und Abgang. Erinnert eher an ein Pils als an ein Lager. Sehr tolles Bier. Besser als Pilsener

Õlle on selline jook, et iga uus kord kui klaasi või pudeli suule tõstad, siis leiad midagi uut, sõltuvalt tuhandest-miljonist pisiasjast, mis hetke olukorda mõjutavad. Seega piirdun iga õlle juures selle tekstiga.
Piwo wypite jakiś czas temu. Tylko ogólna ocena w celu uzupełnienia profilu.
Beer with yellow to gold color, medium body, soft carbonized, some foam on top, (drunk a 50cl draft beer during FTS dinner #2 at "Wenzel Prager Bierstuben", Zwickau, DE #786)(#351 CZ).
Горький, классический, очень понравился. По акции вообще супер. Советую тем кто любит классику

Popularly still regarded as one of the greats, especially in Germany - and I like it myself, enjoying what I regard as the 'Czech tang': a faint post-gulp aroma slightly akin to the smell of old books (but in a nice way). Offering (Czech) Budweiser at a party signals respect for your guests. :-)

Burk 500 ml från Systembolaget. Guldgul med fint skum som sedan försvinner helt. Maltig doft med inslag bröd och apelsin. Smak av malt, bröd, aprikos, apelsin och citrus. Medelstor beska. Ganska prisvärd då den kostar några få kronor mer jämfört med Norrlands Guld, men smakar betydligt bättre.
Trafila mi sie butelka bez wiekszych wad. Ot takie sobie koncernowe piwo o lekko slodowym aromacie i bardzo niska goryczka. Nie ma co sie rozpisywac.
From backlog. On draft at TGI Fridays Prague. Light yellow with white head. Malts, hops with some sweetness.

Robe dorée limpide, jolie carbo, mousse assez faible. Nez puissant et herbacé, une pointe de malt. Attaque herbacée, assez amère, suivie d'un côté un peu pâtissier. L'amertume légère tend à prendre le pas. Un peu aqueux en finale. Rafraichissant.

Transparent yellow/straw color with little head, low retention and lacing. Light aroma and taste of mild roasted cereal, raw cereal and Saaz hops freshness. Light body and watery texture. Very refreshing, light and extemely drinkable.
Golden colour with rich white head. Aroma of hops, grass and bread. Taste rather malty sweet with nice bitter aftertaste.

Cleanly made, better than the American budweiser for sure. But still nothing great for a pilsner. Worse than other european versions of the same beer. This one is just a little harsher.

Of all the czech and german light lagers, this is a big heavier, a bit less crisp, a bit ashy. Not even close to one of the better examples in the region

Well balanced foam of 
Medium density, medium formation. Very light aroma, with some cereals, malted and herbal.
On mouth, very light but with personality, some notes of malt. The end of the sip has low bitterness but the aftertaste brings a little bit more (but not much) thats lasts for some time, asking for another sip.
A good beer for hot days.
cereal, resin, golden, clear, white foam, light sweetness, lightly bitter, medium body, thin feel, lively, average carbonation, long finish,  one of best beers i ever had great lager.

16.9 oz. Czechvar B: Original green bottle poured to a Czech-pils glass at home showing a clear & bright, deep golden hue, with plenty of rising bubbles, a sudsy layer of soft white froth, and ribbons & spots of lacing. The nose was grain, grass & greenery, some hay, a touch of DMS, and a bit of malty sweetness. Light to medium bodied, with decent carbonation, the taste was a similar but mellower presentation of the aroma notes, with moderate earthy, and slightly peppery & dry bitterness that lingered a bit. Very crushable brew.

Draft at the Answer Tasted my brother-in-law's beer. The beer poured a clear amber color with a white head and lacing. Malty aroma greets you. But a solid pils with a very smooth feel. This is a beer that is comfortable to just sip and enjoy. It was better than I expected. This my second beer from this brewery. If you get a chance to have one you will enjoy the difference from the US beer of the same name.

Burk från SB. Gyllengul, klar med ganska lågt skum. Brödig doft med blommor, gräs, och örter. Ganska krispig, men också med en mjuk rund kropp. Aningen mineraler och fina nyanserade smaker. Trrevlig och klassik pilsner. Gott
12gloz bottle, BBD: 06.13.2019, $1.75, pint glass. This beer as expected has all the classic markings of the the style - golden, somewhat fizzy, grassy grain notes all in a body that medium-light.
Pours clear golden with a three finger, white head. Aroma is standard caramel and pils hops. Taste is light caramel, moving to bitter hops. Finish is hoppy.
Burk Systembolaget. Gyllengul vätska. Doft av bröd och örtig humle. Liknande i smak. Hö, örter, aromatisk humle och bröd. Stilren och ganska trevlig
500ml bottle. Pours clear golden colour, medium sized white head. Aroma is graiby, bit caramelly, mild hoppy. Taste is kinda dry, malty, grainy. Light body, average carbonation. Drinkable
Ocena na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji, na potrzeby uzupełnienia profilu. Lekki skunks.
Very nice refreshing beer.  Slightly sweet with a mild bitter finish.  Very well put together.  Perfect beer to have during the summer months. Enjoy!

A little bit matty in the nose and perhaps a fine smell of butter. The first sip has a little taste of bitterness, and it has a malty character. The structure of the end is well balanced beetween maltzness and bitterness. Clasical Budweiser from Czech.
Bags more flavour than its unpleasant but insanely popular American cousin, with malt, cereal and a little bitterness. Medium carbonation, slightly sweet, it's a better than average lager.

330ml bottle
Deep gold with OK head.
Sweet malty/cereal aroma.
Crispish with sweet palate.
OK Pils.

Zlatno zuta boja, skoro bez pjene. Arome biskvita, kvasca, trave, pomalo borovina i citrusi. Srednje prema jakoj gorčini, sa duzim gorkim finišom. Osjeća se jača zahmeljenost. Vodeno-uljane teksture, jake karbonizacije.

Sour bread like taste, pours with a medium sized head. The taste is light and not palate intensive.
Feels orangy.

Bottle to glass. Straw/light gold, small head. Aroma is light caramel toast and light herbal hops. Flavor similar, crisp. Nice lightly bitter dry finish. Light mouthfeel, medium high carb. Refreshing. Way better'n Bud.
On tap clear yellow with minamal white head. Aroma is honey, hay and grass. Taste is medium sweet and light bitter. Palate is thin with soft carbonation.
50cl bottled. Yellow golden body, medium to thick white head with decent carbonation. Aroma is hops. Flavour hops and light bitterness. Decent beer, smooth drink
gewoon standaard pils, lekker als je op je luie reet in de zon zit, al een stuk beter dan de Amerikaanse Bud.
捷克的百威 开瓶就散发出厚实的香气 入口香甜带着啤酒花的味道 后段的苦味很喜欢 捷克百威+世界杯的夏夜 是多么的幸福 居然很喜欢年轻法国的奔跑和冲刺 年纪大了吧
Une bière qui se laisse très facilement boire, très légère et rafraîchissante avec ses saveurs maltées.

0,5 can.Minimal white head, but the color is classic Czech pilsner. Unwrapped solid aroma. Highly carbonated, the taste is more like hop bitterness, with a small box of taste, very slightly watery, but still a reliable, drinkable quality. Until they start brewing in Hungary  :) Recommended, perhaps a bit expensive compared to its quality, but very good drinking beer.
***
Minimális fehér hab, de a színe klaszikus cseh pilseni. Lekeríkett szolíd illat. Erősen szénsavas, ízre inkább a komlós keserűség jön át, kicsi doboz ízzel, nagyon kicsit vizes, de azért egy megbízható, iható minőség. Amíg nem kezdik el nálunk gyártani :) Ajánlott, ahhoz képest talán kicsit drága, amit tud,  de nagyon jó ivó sör.
Bottle. A brilliant pilsner - but not better than Urquell. But rich and aromatic. Could have more hops...
Clear golden colour with white head, typical pils aroma, medium bitterness.

Pours a clear gold on tap with fluffy white head that dissipates to leave moderate lace. Aroma of light noble hops and clean, crisp malt and adjuncts. Taste is even more of the hops and a touch of light esters and phenols, but delicate and expected. Definitely tastes like a Budweiser, but a bit better. A little too sweet and buttery in the package.
Na zdrowie, Salud, Kampai, Prost, Skaal, Zivjeli, Fenékig, На здоровь& Na zdravi.

Botella de 330ml, servida en un vaso Praga de Czechvar. Color dorado brillante e intenso, con corona de espuma cremosa y carbonatación vivaz. Aroma equilibrado a granos dulces con notas florales y a especias. Sabor a granos ligeramente horneados con un refrescante amargor floral y a especias. Cuerpo ligero, con buena carbonatación. Una cerveza para repetir!
Perfect looking beer.Malty, clean and smooth. Little bit of hoppy bitterness finish. Definitely quality hut maybe taste wise it's nothing exceptional.
Bottle 66cl. Definitely one of the best lager beer I’ve ever tasted. Flavorful and refreshing. Perfect for any occasion

Bottle 33cl. I've tasted this after Staropramen. The colour is somewhere between gold and amber. The head is not so tough, it goes away in 20 secs. On the nose it's moderately malty, less roasted notes. The CO2 is short on this one either,  the palate is nicely balanced with a bit of bitterness inside. I've expected more gas in Czechs, so i'm a tiny bit disappointed now, especially because of the short foam. But i like the yeast, it gives a nice background taste, smooth and easy. Nice lager, can't say anything bad about the taste.
Budweiser Budvar B:Original (Czechvar) 12° alk. 5%. Porządnie wykonany Pils, dosyć mocno chmielowy z wyczuwalną lekką, przyjemną goryczką

A méltán híres Budweiser-Budvar. Szerintem a helyi víz teszi, hogy ennyire jól iható, izgalmas serrel van dolgunk. Kicsit lemarad a Pilsner Urquell-tól, de még mindig a top 10 legjobb cseh ser kategóriába tenném. Ami engem illet ezzel be is fejezem a leírást, az ital magáért beszél. Kár a szóért.

Appearance of The bottle is not attractive, I would redesign it... Apart from That  the taste is awesome, balanced, not bitter and like a clear  nice lager, fresh beer, great for any occasion . Reminds me a little bit to Stella.

Tap @Budvarka, Prague, Czechia.
Pours golden with white head, clear. Aroma: malts, berries. Light bitter taste, light body, lively. Quite refreshing, but nothing spectacular.

Best lager in Europe 
Been drinking it for years
Shame it’s not widely available in France. It gets compared with that rubbish beer from USA with a similar name.
Cette bière passe plutôt bien et reste honnête par rapport à la concurrence.
Fles 50cl thuis. Fris, beetje bitter, vrij hoppig, licht maltig, redelijk zacht. (7-2011).
Lijepe zlatne boje i fantasticnog okusa...pitko,pomalo slatkasto...izvrsni ceski pilsner..
Przyjemna barwa i wygląd.  Nienachalne, lekkie w smaku. Orzeźwiające, smaczne. Jedno z lepszych piw spośród łatwo dostępnych.

Skunks, woda i ciut słodu. Poza tym nie ma w tym piwie absolutnie nic, chmiel ledwo wyczuwalny gdzieś tam hen w oddali, goryczka niemalże zerowa, do tego jeszcze mokry karton to chleb powszedni. Bardzo bardzo kiepski eurolager.

Dosyć pijalni lager, który niczym nie urzeka. Zapach bardzo przeciętny, wręcz lekko odpychający. W smaku lekko gorzkie, lekko słodkie. Na plus na pewno pewien aromat-nazwałbym chmielowy ale dosyć sztuczny, mało intensywny.

Pilsener van 5%, zeg maar de Tsjechische versie van Budweiser. Ietwat flauw. Maar ja, Budweiser.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle. Moderate grain for the malt, light to moderate herbs for the hops, light leaves for the yeast, with a note of paper in the background. Head is small, frothy, white, with no lacing and is fully diminishing. Color is clear golden. Flavor starts lightly acidic, then finishes lightly acidic and bitter. Palate is light to medium, watery, with a lively carbonation. A classis Bohemian Pilsener.

Clear golden color, minimal white head. Pale malt, grains, light caramel, bread, citrus, metal. Very watery. Light to medium bitterness, light sweetness, light sourness. Bready finish. Very inconsistent Světlý, not recommended - this one literally tasted watered down, more like 9.5°.

Label stamped: Best Before 11-01-2018/B1. Pleasant lager aroma, a little faint; bready and a bit of herbal hops. 1/2 inch white head fades quickly, stringy lacing. Bright gold/amber with small carb bubbles. Bready malts with moderate bittering and herbal taste from this hops in the middle and finish. Easy drinking and refreshing, with a bit of mineral giving it a clean finish. Mild taste; could be more assertive.
Uma pilsen saborosa e encorpada. Cor dourada e espuma branca. Aroma um tanto discreto.
Drack denna pilsner riktigt väl kyld, den har en liten parfymsmak och passar därför bäst att drickas ur glas och ej flaska.

Złote, klarowne, piana redukuje się do małej warstwy i zostawia delikatny ślad na szkle.
W zapachu słody i lekkie masło. W smaku już prawie nie czuć masła, tylko słodowość i delikatną, cierpką goryczkę. Podobno lekkie "masło" jest w stylu czeskiego pilznera, mi absolutnie nie przeszkadza. Bardzo dobre piwo, bardziej treściwe od większości koncerniaków, ale wciąż pijalne i rześkie.
Czeski lager. Pestkowy aromat, chmielony lekko. W smaku lager ale po czesku. Takie piwa powinny wazyc koncerny polskie.
Tak w skrócie - cudownie pijalny, gładki, lekko chmielowy, czysty i słodowy czeski lager. Można pić po kilka szklanek. Ale lepiej nie, jednak ma 5%
Best enjoyed from a straight long glass, and encourage a good frothy pouring to enhance the taste. The bottled stuff is dryer and sharper than tap, with a lingering aftertaste. Tap is a lot better!
Prakticky tady přidávám tento komentář, jen aby tady něco bylo, protože zpětně dopisuji 900 piv z mého seznamu a asi bych se musel u toho zbláznit.

Wygląd: Jasnozłota barwa, całkowicie klarowna z widocznymi uciekającymi bąbelkami. Piana biała drobnopęcherzykowa po nalaniu dość wysoka, ale szybko opada do małego pierścienia, nie pozostawia lacingu. Wygląd to głowna zaleta, potem jest tylko gorzej. Aromat: Po otwarciu lekka czysta siarka, zapach mało lotny, delikatna słodowość chlebowa i ziołowość. Doza starego chmielu. Smak: Pusto, lekka słdodowość chlebowa z minimalną nieprzyjemną goryczką ziołową. Na finiszu trochę cierpkości. Wysycenie wysokie z bardzo niskim ciałem.
Bottle. Sweetness completed with short, high Bitterness. Complex, Full-bodied Taste. Balanced Lager, golden color, golden taste.
Clear yellow body with a medium white head. Aroma is malty, light grainy. Taste is sweet and low bitter. Light body, watery texture.

500ml green bottle. As Czechvar B:Original. Pours a crystal clear gold with a medium, foamy, long lasting, white head that leaves plenty of lace. Aroma of cracker malt, corn, grass and faint lemon. Sweet flavour of grainy pale malt and lemon with a mild, bitter grass finish. Light body with a watery texture and soft carbonation. Boring, but very drinkable.

Ar: Bright grass and lemon with an edge of just-green-still dried fall leaves--classic Saaz; a tiny bit of cracker malt with sulfur. Ap: Crystal-clear orange; medium-large slightly off-white head with moderate retention, settling into a thick haze atop the liquid and leaving almost-solid peaks of lacing. T: Soft and rounded maltiness up front; bitterness is very high but very lean; black pepper, grass, and a hint of lemon; wet dough and holly leaves; finish is bitterness, dried bouquet of flowers, sulfur, and crackers. P: Medium-light body with very high carbonation; creamy and soft; finish is very dry. O: Beautiful; full of fresh Saaz hop aroma and flavor; the maltiness is round, assertive, and graceful yet never sweet and in no way detracting from the hops.
A clear golden pilsner with a white head and nice balanced bitter aftertaste.

Gold with a white head. Lots of bubbles, will creep out of the bottle if you do not pour it in to a glass. The aroma has fruity lager yeast esters, with some Saaz hops, and sweet pils malt, just fantastic. The flavor is similar, nice balance, but a little sweet on the finish. A original example of the style. Well enjoyed.

Ocena przeniesiona z innego piwnego portalu. 
Średnio-koncernowo-nudno-przeciętne. Dość gorzkie.
Z pudełka z Budweiserami. Tak troszkę cienko, lekko łodygowo, w słodową stronę. Są lepsze pilsy.
Goldgelbe Farbe, blank. Viel, feinporig, weißer Schaum. Hopfenblumige Aromen. Malzig, nussig, süß am Gaumen. Vollmundig, angenehm cremig im Mund. 0,5l-Flasche am 24.1.18
(tout ce qui m’avait détourné de la bière quand j’avais à peine l’âge d’en boire, mais pour le folklore, ça peut aller)
It´s OK for a classical pilsener. This one is on a sweeter end which I don´t mind. But it also has some hints of bitterness just much more subtle than usual.

Aroma-10/12
Appearance-3/3
Flavor-17/20
Mouthfeel-4/5
Overall Impression-9/10
Total-43/50

风格：Czech Premium Pale Lager
酒精度：5%vol
灌装日期：2017.06.06

饮用日期：2018.01.24
饮用温度：3℃-8℃

香气：明显、干净的麦芽蜂蜜气息，一些发酵酚酯香，一点双乙酰和（或）DMS，偏下的欧洲酒花的药草、木质香气。

外观：很干净的赤金色稍偏橙，色度约7；倒入后酒头洁白厚实，但不算特别持久，挂杯还不错。

风味：入口干净的麦芽谷物、面包味，配合优雅、低调的欧洲酒花的药草、辛香料苦香，少量的酯酚香，收口稍干，但有蜂蜜甜感徘徊于喉线；余味长久，优雅的酒花辛香配合淡淡麦芽谷物味。

口感：中度偏轻酒体，发酵较干净，入口圆润，细密的中等杀口感、收口稍干，可能是受酒花辛香影响。

总体印象：一款非常正宗、平衡的捷克皮尔森，因为是易拉罐装，风味保存良好，绝对是风格标杆。入口麦芽面包、蜂蜜甜十分干净，欧式贵族酒花的辛香配合得低调而优雅，余味亦无仓促。这才是日常饮用的好酒，拉格（皮尔森）的平衡易饮、干净优雅特质展示无遗！

建议饮用温度5℃-8℃
Most of the flavour comes from the sweet malts with some mild spice but a bit dead and dry for s Svelty. Overall its a step above your standard affair but not that much. Better lagers about.
caramel, golden, clear, white foam, minimal head, medium sweetness, medium bitterness, lightly sour, average carbonation, medium body,
Bottle 500 ml at GBK Westfield/ Shepherds Bush.  Malty aromas with a crisp citrus finish. Clear golden body and small white head. Taste is malts with a clean and sharp citrus finish.

Pivo u flaši. Dok ne budem otišao u Češku na "izvor" , ovo mi je najdraži Češki pilsner i općenito najdraži "velikoprodukcijski" Lager. Već godinama kad pijem Lager u 99% slučajeva pijem njega. Volim tu njegovu laganu slatkoću , mekoću tijela i finu aromu. Eto toliko! P. S. Eeee da mi je "po kuna" od svakog kojeg sam popio :)

Great beer! Underrated! This beer won a - six - beer - eight - person ( my friends and family) blind taste test against tough first rate international beers. How this beer rated a 3 overall on your site makes me wonder why?

Botellas en varias ocasiones. Y caña en el kraken 08..01..2018. (r2246). Color dorado transparente con espuma blanca persistente fina. Sabores frescos cereales y maltas con toques de levaduras suaves. Ligeros afrutados plátanos. Cuerpo ligero fácil de beber algo espumoso y cierta densidad. Buena, refrescante. Buena opción si no hay nada más,

"The beer is dark golden in colour with a thin white foam lacing on top. It tastes crisp with a nice amount of malty bitterness. It ends with a nice round finish making it a very good czech pilsner." - beersoftheworldproject.wordpress.com

Date: 26/10/2014

Bought at: Arkivet Nattbar in Stavanger, Norway.

Bottiglia. All'olfatto si esprimono sentori di orzo. L'intensità olfattiva è elevata e il modo in cui permane è apprezzabile. Il cappello di schiuma resiste poco. La grandezza delle bollicine è media. Il liquido è di consistenza trasparente. La frizzantezza si presenta sotto forma di bollicine medie. La carbonazione rientra nella media. Il colore è giallo dorato carico. Il corpo è pieno. L'amaro è medio normale non invasivo. L'intensità gustativa è normale. La costanza gustativa è sufficiente. Il gusto è piacevole. Le sensazioni boccali che permangono sono di facile beva. Il finale è semplice e dissetante. Il retrogusto è di media intensità. L'aroma in bocca porta note di miele, orzo e cereali.
Clear gold liquid with no head. Aroma of malts, bread and wet cardboard. Taste of malts. Very typical Low bitterness.
Butelka 0,5 l. Klasyczny czeski pilsner. Trochę masełka, trochę kukurydzy. Prawilny smaku stylu.
Flaska från SB. Gyllengul kulör med vit skumkrona. Frisk doft av pilsnermalt och tall. Mediumsöt, halvblaskig och frisk munkänsla. Smak av bröd, tall och mineraler.
Bottle 0.5 ,Clear golden pour with white head. Malty with little bit grasiness, bitter and sweet taste. Nice silky texture with some medium carbonation.
Pour pale straw with thin white head. Grass malt aroma  with a sharp refreshing taste

500 ml can. Got in "Fuente Mardoqueo". clear color, big head fo a lager. Grass tipical smell, nothing special, but the taste is way better than a regular lager.hoppy taste, but with grains at the same time. Super good, loved it.

Appearance Clear yellow, very small and weak head 

Aroma Skunk, grains, minerals, some noble hops 

Taste Dry, bitter 

Palate Medium-watery, very high carbonation
Hafif metalik koku, bol köpüklü. Asit oranı yüksek değil fakat alkol tadı fazlasıyla alınıyor. Su tadı malta baskın geliyor aromasında.

Botella 0,33l Color dorada con espuma blanca, muy fina,alta, resistente. Aroma- malta, cereales, frutas.Sabor- es un CLASICO! Un dulzor suave y agradable mezclado con un fino amargor, malta, cereales, frutal. Una de las mejores en su categoria
Jedan od bio boljih uvoznih lagera iz Češke. Nisam ljubitelj ali ok je piva.  Bolja od svih hrv indust piva kod nas. Pitko i sjeda ok. Ok lager beer. Drinkable and good solid taste. Real lager beer.

Very small head but usual bright yellow appearance, lovely balance of hops and malt, much more restrained than it's fellow Czech behemoth Pilsner Urquell, quite yeasty, refreshing and tasty.  Much better than the American swill that nicked it's name.  One of those beers that's good drank sraight from the bottle.  A go to amongst super market beers.

Aromat słodki słodowy, trochę tytoniu, słodki karmelowy. Złota barwa, piana ładna po nalaniu jednak nie utrzymuję się długo po chwili redukuję się do zera. Piwo przejrzyste i klarowne w pełni. W smaku bardzo gładkie, goryczka średnio-niska szybko ucięta, lekko słodki w smaku. Ogólnie piwo bardzo udane. Jest bardzo sesyjne dosłownie można pić i pić i jak to mówi polski Janusz piwosz wchodzi jak woda :) Żarty na bok piwo znane i dobre godny przedstawiciel gatunku :)

On tap at Sobo 151. Clear golden colored appearance with a white head. Aroma of toasted grain, light bready notes and light noble hops. Similar flavor, adding mild malt sweetness and light hop bitterness. Light, crisp and pretty easy to drink overall.

Butelka z datą 04.09.2018. Kolor z złoty , piana średnioobfita szybko się redukuje. W aromacie słód diacetyl delikatny chmiel. W smaku pustawe ale przez diacetyl, jest to zredukowane, wyraźnie zaznaczona goryczka. Jak na kocerniaka przyzwoicie.

Klassisches Pils mit rundem Geschmack und hoher Drinkability. Kaum Aroma, wenn dann leicht malzig floral. Geschmack insgesamt mild wässrig mit Malzaromen und leichter Süße. Kurzer, unspektakulärer Abgang.

On tap at brewery in Ceske Budejovice, Czech Republic. Pours a pale biscuity gold with a thin white head. Aroma: biscuity malt, mild citrus and sweet malt. Taste: biscuity and sweet malt, mild citrus flavours, mild grassy/herbal flavours. Basic flavour palate. Moderate carbonation. Thin bodied. Mild sweetness. Easy drinking, and quite tasty when fresh - not quite as good quality when bottled in my experience. Not an amazing beer, but perfect when coupled with hearty Czech or German food!
Złociste piwo z obfitą pianą. Aromat chmiel, trawa, trochę kwiatów. W smaku bardziej słodowe trochę goryczki chmielowej. Piwo te sprzed 15-20 lat wydaje się że było lepsze
Keg at the watering hole. Pours golden, nose is toffee, floral, grassy, taste is similar.

330 ml bottle into lager glass, best before 1/6/2018. Pours crystal clear medium golden yellow color with a small dense white head with great retention, that reduces to a small cap that lingers. Light spotty soapy lacing clings down the glass, with a moderate amount of streaming carbonation retaining the cap. Aromas of big cracker, lightly toasted biscuit, white bread dough, light pepper, and herbal/grassy earthiness. Damn nice aromas with good balance of pale malt and light-moderate earthy hop notes; with great strength. Taste of big cracker, lightly toasted biscuit, white bread dough, light pepper, and herbal/grassy earthiness. Light-moderate herbal, grassy, spicy bitterness on the finish. Lingering notes of cracker, lightly toasted biscuit, white bread dough, light pepper, and herbal/grassy earthiness on the finish for a good bit. Great robustness and balance of pale malt and light-moderate earthy hop flavors; with an awesome malt/bitterness balance, and zero astringent hop flavors after the finish. Lightly increasing dryness from bitterness. Perfectly clean on lager flavors, with zero yeast notes present. Medium carbonation and light-medium body; with a very smooth, moderately bready/grainy, fairly crisp, and lightly sticky balanced mouthfeel that is awesome. Zero warming alcohol as expected of 5%. Overall this is an awesome Czech pilsner! All around great robustness and balance of pale malt and light-moderate earthy hop flavors; very smooth, crisp, clean, and refreshing to drink with the balancing bitter/drying finish. Perfectly executed style example. Never too bitter/drying, and very flavorful for the ABV. Clean pils malt flavors with balancing Saaz hops. A highly enjoyable offering, one of the best I have had in the style.
Butelka. Klasycznie. Słodowo, zbozowo z nutką tytoniową. Lekki skunks, lekki karton. Dość treściwe.
On tap in Prague, Czech Republic. Classic pilsner, classic saaz aroma, the origins of the style. Like it
Colour is very light yellow. Strong smell of malt and corn, a bit of a sweet smell. Taste has a bit of cereal in there, corn again. Pretty good for a lager.

Tap at the Red Lion, Woodbridge. Poured a deep gold with a large frothy white head. Aromatic, floral and hoppy. Moderate sweetness and mid bitterness. Light to medium body, texture a little watery, average to soft carbonation.

Złociste, klarowne z obfitą pianą.
W aromacie chmiel, trawa.
W smaku metaliczne, słodowe.
Takie średnie.

Can from Billa, drunk at home. Honey in colour with a frothy head that lasted a few minutes, little lacing. Complex bitterness from the first sip, some honey, citrus, and bread. Predominantly dry and crisp at the back of the palate after an initially creamy mouth feel. Medium carbonation which combined with the well-balanced hops keeps it refreshing. Overall, although not a massive pilsner fan, I have to admit that this is rather good.
Классический горький пилзнер который я не люблю. Так что думаю что буду не слишком логичен в моей оценке. Думаю что любителям этого сорта его оценят.

De color dorado, totalmente transparente, con espuma blanca y abundante. Bastante carbonatación a la vista, que no se nota tanto al tomarla. Cerveza muy suave tanto en aroma como en sabor, donde predomina la malta de cebada de tipo pilsner, con un gusto muy agradable al lúpulo característico de este estilo, dejando un amrgor sutil. Una birra más que decente que se bebe en pocos tragos, refrescante.

BBD: 12/4/17

2015 BJCP Category: 3B Czech Premium Pale Lager


AROMA: Lightly sweet, caramel-like malty presence. Slight honey-lemon scent from oxidation. Faint spicy/floral hops. 8/12

APPEARANCE: Golden hue (5-7 SRM); crystal clarity and effervescent. Moderate white foam mostly dissipates but does lace fairly well. 3/3

FLAVOR: Lightly sweet bready taste with a caramel undertone. Hops lurk in the background throughout with a spicy/peppery flavor and light dry bitterness. Noticeable honey/lemon flavor in the finish. Slight metallic presence, though it is tolerable. Palette is rather mild overall, but enjoyable. 14/20

MOUTHFEEL: Medium-light body; medium-high carbonation. Highly quaffable, somewhat refreshing. Feels a tad light for 5% ABV, though tempting to session. 3/5

OVERALL IMPRESSION: This is probably a World Class example when fresh, but still a fine example when old. 6/10

TOTAL SCORE: 34/50
Vona skoro ziadna. Farba krasna zlatista. Chut jemne horkasta s prijemnym zakoncenim.

crisp and dry bohemian lager that seems to stand apart from the other czech greats; it does not seem to share the same taste; that deep "malty-ness" and that almost peat-like water that seems to be used, for lack of a better way of putting it. whilst the others are refreshing and moreish, i find budvar to be sharper and with a more Germanic approach in regards to its flavour. i have also never seen it on tap in CZ, but only on the shelves of local supermarkets. some local, er, characters call this "the rip-off budweiser", thinking it is a cheap alternative to the american one.

Zapach przyjemny. Kolor bardzo jasny, piana drobno pęcherzykowata, szybko opada. W smaku wyczuwalna metaliczność, ale gdy ten smak minie, piwo jest całkiem przyjemne. Goryczka lekka/średnia, wyczuwalna jest też masłowość. Całkiem dobry lager.
Bottle. Pours clear golden, small white head. Aroma is grass, hops. Light sweetness, light bitterness, soft carbonation. Taste is malts, hay, mild citrus notes, a bit watery. Nice.
Alluring grassy aroma in a golden pour. Spot on hop-malt balance is bigger than the benchmark (Pilsner Urquell) and has a sharper finish.
The real deal. Golden Bohemian Lager, rich, full-bodied taste. For me, the best lager on the planet.

W aromacie metaliczność, spora maślaność, do tego trawiastość, nuta słodowa - mało intensywne. W smaku jest ewidentnie metaliczne, słodowe, z wyraźną chmielową - kojarzącą się z ziołami - goryczką. Nagazowanie średnie. Smak lepszy niż zapach. Idealnie klarowane z niezbyt trwałą, aczkolwiek wysoką pianą. Wodniste. Dosyć pustawe. Słabo.
A 50 cl bottle from BC Liquor store. A pale amber beer with generous white head. Moderately hopped and malted, but a decent thirst quencher on a hot August afternoon after 18 holes of golf! 3.3

Bottle from Whole Foods Market in Redwood City, CA. Aroma is grass, European breads and honey...very unpretentious. Taste is earthy, sweet, hearty and bitter. Absolutely excellent. Loads of flavor and equally refreshing.

Tap at Bokovka. Malty aroma, yeasty notes, lifgt bready notes. Clear golden color, creamy white head. Malty taste, bready notes, medium bitter. Medium body, slick texture, soft to average carbonation and malry bitter finish. Good.

Pours clear golden with a thin head. Aroma of malts, hay, with a citrusy note. Taste of malts, light hoppy bitterness, a bit watery. Shortlived bitter aftertaste. This and it’s dark counterpart, were my go-to lagers before the craft revolution
Czechvar, bera dourada, límpida, bom corpo aroma acentuado, baixa acidez, cerveja pra todo dia.
33cl bottle. clear golden color. small white head. malts, hops, citrus, bread, yeast. medium bitterness with medium carbonation.
Kolor jasnozloty. Zapach slodowy, lekki karton. Smak pusty. Gdzieniegdzie slodowosc. Slabe.

500 ml bottle. Clear golden colour liquid with a thin white head that dissipates really fast leaving several bubbly foam flakes on the surface. The initial aroma is subdued hops and malt sweetness. In a minute I could trace some citric and tangerine echoes, but both aromas were quite unstable. The flavor consisted of buttery malts mostly. Plus weak grassy hop ending. Oily texture and dry finish. Soft carbonation. The lager is pleasant to consume, but for a ticker it is nothing but a routine.
Thuis gedronken uit fles, een uitstekende pils. Zeer helder geel, wit schuim dat niet lang blijft. Voor het moment erg lekker.
W zapachu lekki slód i chmiel typowy dla pilsów. Piana sredniopecherzykowa, przejrzyste, kolor slomkowy. Bardzo lekka goryczka, wyczuwalna lekka slodycz. Srednie wysycenie.

Bottle. Clear golden colour with a medium white head, nose is aromatic malty, hoppy-grassy and slightly metallic, taste is also malty and sweet with a moderately dry finish and a distinctive earthy aftertaste that is typical for this beer.

Tap. Clear gold with a medium white head. Some dough, hay, sweet corn, grains, artificial lemon. Medium to high sweetness, short sharp bitterness. Slick body, with lots of soft carbonation. Decent, but very sweet.

0,5lt bottle in Düsseldorf supermarket. Clear yellow beer, thick white foam with low retention. Once opened it smells like hops, skunk and pot. When served, aromas are somehow lost and one can hardly perceive some butter and grass smell. 
Pils malts, bread, little yeast taste, medium-bodied, very well balanced flavour, carbonation clears off pretty quick.
Ending tends to bitter, very drinkable and not cloying in the way you can have as many as you can and never become weary of it. One of the best industrial pils available in Europe and definetly a thirst quenching one!

I acquired this 500 ml bottle at a kiosk in Cologne while on a trip overseas. Pouring it into a pilsner glass I view a medium yellow body with little or no foam although the carbonation is active. The scent tends toward grain and biscuit. I taste water, crackers, a little metal and a very small bit of sweetness. Interesting history, average beer.
Bready malt with lemon and hay in there. Short and sharp in the mouth and leaves a clean palate .. related 28/12/19. Nice for session. Enjoyed with vodka shark chaser

Crystal clear brilliant golden with a thin white head. Nice doughy lagerish nose with a classic light grassy noble hoppy tone that’s slightly earthy. Crisp semidry flavor that’s noble and crackery lagerish, super clean and balanced, but a touch light. Herbal grassy hops to balance but it’s not a strong presence. Clean and classic but just kinda alright.
w aromacie i smaku przeważa słód, ogolnie puste, gorycz jest niska i ziołowo/trawiasta, nie ma powrotu do czeskich piwek z kraftu ;(

500 mL bottle shared with ebone1988. Picked this beauty up at the Spar attached to Graz Hauptbahnhof. Oh boy. The pour is a darker golden yellow with a thicker white head that falls to a creamy thick ring with a couple spots of lace. The aroma is really Czech pils forward. The malts and graininess are huge. Light bready grain and sweet malt. The light aluminum comes through late. The flavor is more bready malt forward. There isn’t any metallic, which is nice. Anlight bitterbuoo is present, and it’s surprisingly better than I thought it would be. It’s got an alcohol sweetness on the back end that is strange. The mouth feel is light and clean with a decent carbonation and a lingering malty sweetness. It’s better than I thought it would be. For science, I guess.

Bottle shared with koleminer20, for the book. Bottle from Spar Grocery in Graz, Austria. Aroma is sweet corn, earthy, bitter, funky, floral, cereal. Appearance is golden, clear, off white head. Taste is floral, cereal, earthy hops, almost savory, grainy, decent. Mouthfeel is light body, dry, light crisp carbonation, grainy earthy hop aftertaste. Overall, this isn’t terrible. 5 4 7 4 14

Pours golden with a frothy white head. 

Aroma of adjuncts, pilsner malts. Yeast and hops. 

Taste is a little grassy, malty and sweet. Decently crisp. Medium carbonation.

Bottle 50 cl. Pours clear golden color. Aroma is flowery and spicy. Light to medium body with good carbonation. Taste is crisp graininess with hints of malt and caramel. Low bitterness. well balanced.

the aroma is malty and hoppy with hints of grain, herbs and spices... the taste is malty, very clear and refreshening, with notes of grain, grasses, hay and some spices... bitter and dry aftertaste...

Piwo barwy złotej, idealnie klarowne. Piana średnio obfita, drobne i średnie pęcherzyki, niezbyt trwała. Aromat niezbyt wyraźny, lekka nuta słodu pilzneńskiego, bardzo delikatny diacetyl. W smaku nieco puste, dosyć wytrawne, z subtelną nutą słodową i diacetylem. Mocno wysycone, goryczka niska.

I spend several weeks each year in the Czech Republic and enjoy the beers a lot (I find that you are less likely to go wrong with a Czech lager than those from anywhere else - even though British ale is my usual choice). Budvar is, of course, one of the iconic and most widely known, brewed with whole Saaz hops. Newcomers will probably find it a bit watery and disappointing, particularly in comparison with the more characterful Pilsner Urquell - Budvar lacks the bitterness and length of that classic. Nevertheless, there are few beers more quenching on a hot and sunny day. It is a great session beer - clean and pure.
Appearance: straw coloured; large but rapidly disappearing white head.
Aroma: very subtle; cereal in there somewhere.
Palate: mainly smooth and honeyed but with detectable edge (particularly at the front of the mouth); Fast disappearing aftertaste.
Flavour: Honey, grass and cereals; flowery; good balance of bitterness and sweetness.
Fles gedeeld met Roelzie1986. Het is een pils achtig bier met redelijk wat schuim.

Bottle. Clear golden colour, average, quickly disappearing white head. Aroma of pale malt, bread and skunk. Taste is light sweet, light to medium bitter, pale malt, bread, grain. Light+ body, thin, watery texture, average carbonation. Macro lager, but fairly drinkable.

0,5 l can. Pours clear golden yellow with big white head. Aroma of malt and bread, very subtle floral hop notes. Flavor is similar bread with floral notes, somewhat grainy and grassy. Very light bitterness. Body is medium, texture oily.
Piwo wypite jakiś czas temu. Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji, w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.

Blind tasting out of a black glass/ Sampled together with Dr. Beer . Smell is corny malts, not much hops, mild fruityness ( orange) that is rather hidden . very subtile touch of bitterness. Very distant ambermalts. 
taste is sweet, corny malts, very mild bitterness. Very mild buttery notes, not sure of dyacethyl? Some ambermalts. Mildly astrigent. Very mild caramel notes. Aftertaste is weak. Not very refreshing, rather easy drinking.
Simple straightforward light beer minerality turns metallic on the pallet. Balanced and underwhelming

It pours golden with a white head. Head retention is moderately low. It has a strong herbal aroma that is grainy sweet. The is a hint of honey in the background. It is grainy sweet with a moderate fruit flavor. The fruit flavor is pear like in quality. It has a moderately light body with a grainy sweet aftertaste. Overall, this is a grainy sweet fruity beer.

Clear golden color. A fresh flowery and spicy aroma. Light to medium body with good carbonation. Taste is crisp graininess with hints of malt and caramel. Low bitterness. All in all a tasty and well balanced Czech Pilsner that is an archetype of its style.

Review: 0.51CL Bottle of Budweiser Budvar B:Original Czech imported lager : ABV: 5%

The iconic beer, the original, totally different to that American namesake, coming in a large 0.51CL bottle.

On pour get a nice clear golden colour that produces a decent looking white head, that is big and frothy. Head maintains. Some nice carbonation, actively bubbling away.

It is a nice and clear looking beer that’s for sure, what a beer should look like. Promising……..

Lovely beery smell of grains and malted barley. Nice aroma……….

On taste a very beery taste, clean and crisp, strong in alcohol content, can definitely feel the alcohol and yeast in the beer and very smooth to drink.

Perhaps a little too malty for me though

There is a lot of carbonation and I do wonder if the green bottles have something to do with the overall taste, as it tastes ok but a little skunky, and considering its reputation it is nothing amazing.
Very smooth, definitely a session beer as its very drinkable, despite not having an amazing array of tastes. Light in hops, no aftertaste to speak of.

As mentioned, a lot of Malt, it is really malty!

But overall, it is a good session beer, wouldn’t mind downing a few of these, and one I would like to try again for the future, preferably in downtown Prague…..(or Budějovice!) with a fresh version.

Pale clear golden yellow with quickly disolving white head. Light sweet malt aroma with quite some diacetyl (almost a little estery with banana notes I think). Bière jaune-orangée, parfaitement limpide malgré quelques toutes petites particules en suspension, effervescence moyenne, et surmontée d’un col blanc pas tellement large ni tellement dense, mais tout de même assez résistant. Arômes de malt pâle, céréale sucrée, sirop de maïs, avec pointe de houblon citronné et végétal (feuillage, branchage…). Par moment, les effluves semblent peut-être un peu plus fruité (petits fruits…), mais ce n’est vraiment rien pour s’exciter. Nez très ordinaire, complexité et intensité faibles. En bouche, pétillement moyen sur la langue, onctuosité moyenne au palais. Au goût, entrée maltée de pain frais, gros grain sucré pas trop subtil et sirop de maïs… suivi d’un houblon principalement végétal et quelque peu citronné, en route vers une finale à l’amertume plutôt légère. Tout comme au nez, on semble déceler quelques saveurs plus fruitées par moment, petits fruits, réglisse rouge… Ça goûte bon, mais ce n’est vraiment rien d’extraordinaire, intensité correcte en bouche, faible complexité. Pilsener tchèque? Bah! Ça goûte pas mal comme plein d’autres lagers importés sur le marché québécois selon moi. Peut-être une «bit» plus amère… Bière correcte, sans plus…
Aus der Flasche. Goldene Farbe, klar, etwas Schaum. Aroma Getreide, etwas Zitrone. Geschmack leicht herb, Malzsüsse. Viel Kohlensäure

Uzupełnienie profilu

Masło, słód, delikatna ziołowa nuta chmielowa. W smaku słodowe, lekkie, goryczka wyczuwalna

APARIENCIA: de color dorado, se observa cristalina y una media actividad de carbonatación; corona de espuma color blanco de baja retención, burbujas compactas y abiertas.

AROMA: ligero pero presente dulzor de maltas, algo del lúpulo de carácter herbal noble muy ligerito, algo mineral.

SABOR: similar al aroma; la maltosidad destaca, el dulzor de ellas, algo mineral del agua y ligeramente algo herbal de los lúpulos nobles utilizados. El retrogusto un amargor ligero alto, seco y no astringente.

SENSACIÓN: cuerpo ligero, carbonatación media.

RESUMEN: una buena cerveza de acuerdo al estilo.
