Smak Słodowy, lekko pustawe w smaku. Goryczka niska, i tu się zawiodłem. Wysycenie średnie do dużego.

Marka tegoż piwa znana jest pewnie niemal każdemu. Znana nazwa, do tego z Czech - musi być super! Otóż - nie musi ;) Nie jest to jakaś tragedia, ale co najwyżej przeciętniak... Złoty kolor i ładna, biała piana. To, oczywiście, standard... W aromacie słód. W smaku słód, trochę mokrego kartonu i siarki. Goryczki brak. Na szczęście te najgorsze nuty nieco zelżały z czasem, ale nie zmienia to faktu, że to taki napój słodowy... Jak na swego rodzaju klasyk - poniżej oczekiwań...

Aroma : grass
 Appearance : clear gold
 Taste: good malty , grainy
 Palate : light body
 origin of Budweiser in USA 
 In Czech Pilsner

500 ml bottle. Pours clear golden with a white head. Grassy herb aroma. Watery body with average carbonation. The taste is lightly sweet and bitter with aromas of grainy malt. Very short and overall flat.
Malty, some biscuit and corn, sweet, very high carbonation. Medium bitterness. It’s rather an eurolager not a pilsner.
Decent Czech Pilsner, nice herbal aroma, medium-low bitterness, bready/herbal taste, good appearance.
0,5l can. Pale yellow colour with quickly disappearing white head. Aroma: Hay, booze,grass. Taste: Medium bitter taste, a bit watery. Light body with lively carbonation. A bit sour/bitter finish.
Clear golden, medium head. Aroma od malt, saaz hops and metal. Taste is grainy, a bit sour with bitterness too low for a pilsner. Light and drinkable, doesn’t differ much from typical eurolagers.
0.5l can. Clear golden body with a thin white head. Aroma and taste of bread, grains, hay and floral hops. It’s one of the moderately hopped pilsners. OK beer.

0.5 l bottle @ Cafe Piritta, Helsinki. Nice pale clear colour with a decent head. Even this imported bottle does have some of that malty flavour typical for Czech pilsners. Nice to have in a hot summer day.

On tap. Clear golden colour with a massive, white head. Light sweet, malty and bready. Taste of malt, grain and light hops. Light to medium bitterness in the end. Light body with medium carbonation. Nothing special, but very refreshing.

Draft at the Taphouse, Copenhagen. Clear golden with a white head. Aroma of grain, light biscuit, cereal, light fruit and light citrus. Flavour is light to light moderate sweet and light bitter. Above light bodied with light carbonation.
Nice colour, no head, bit malty taste but not too moch, has a good apple like aftertaste. Great beer if you want to drink somethin lighter but tasty.
tap @ czech. pale colour, light body, high carbonated, rich foam, easy to drink pilsner
Довольно приятный Чешский пилс, красивый цвет, аромат цитрусов, мягкая горчинка, пьется легко, пены немного, советую.
toast, cereal, basement aromas, cooked vegetables, golden, clear, white foam, light sweetness, medium bitterness, lightly sour, light body, thin feel, soft carbonation, bitter,

Clear golden pour with small, short lasting white head. Typical lager smell, slightly sweet. 

Medium body with subtle carbonation. Taste balances sweet and sour notes with bitter aftertaste. Aroma is pretty standard, malts, yeast, some hops, a bit herbal and grassy.

Overall, shares the fate of most of the beers of this style, too boring and unimaginative.
Golden color, white but not long lasting head. Aroma is bread, malty. Little hop aroma. Tasting of some caramel, medium body. Very little citrus, fresh floral notes.
Chiara, schiuma fine. Odore erbaceo, cereali, sapore analogo; dissetante e amara.
Grain, grass, hints of caramel, bit metallic, good white head not persistant, deep golden, light body, medium carbonation, grain, grass, bitter final...the really and only budweiser.

Bottle into pils glass, clear straw yellow color with white head. Aroma notes of pale malt sweetness and stronger that average grassy/earthy hops. Taste adds some faint floral and herbal notes. Light body, moderate-heavy carbonation, crisp with clean finish. Tad more flavorful than your average pale lager, pretty solid.
Can. Clear golden colour with small lasting head. Aroma is sweet ,alt and slightly hoppy. Sweet but fresh taste. Decent pils/lager.
From Hipercor. In Teku glass. Watching Vikings 4x07. Feels much more refreshing and clean than the pilsner urquell, both in aroma and taste. Tasted just after a pilsner urquell, for comparing.
Blind test of (mostly) swiss lagers. Golden color with foam ring. Very shy nose. Strongish, yet watery malty body. Standard aftertaste.
Bottle. Pours a clear gold with an average white head. Aroma of malt and grass. Taste is malt, grass, floral, and some citrus. Decent.

Clear gold color with nice but not strongest white foam. Aromas sweet malt, green peas, cabage and cucamber (strange I know but it does smell fresh of greens in a nicer way). Palate, medium body with with not too watery texture either. leaving very light sweet malty and again that green fresh aftertaste. Taste is on the sweet side of light malt, green peas or very light and more dusty hops. Overall, surprised! Can not complain for a lager type it is very good lager. Not my favourite beer but not pee water either. If you like lager style beers give it a shot. (definatly not same budweiser as american one that one is pure pee water)

Golden crisp colour. Clean texture. Has white head that dissapears immediately, which is very disappointing. Visually unappealing. Not as much carbonation as i expected, but pleasant tasting. Smooth and medium body. Medium texture. Pleasant not overbearing after taste that lasts.
W aromacie słodowość, trochę chmielu. Barwa złocista, kiepska piana. Goryczka jak na jasnego lagera całkiem przyzwoita.

Pint at R.F.D. Washington. Well I finally had it - it’d been years and years and I finally had real Budweiser. Actually, I was quite happy with the results here, I expected a skunky, grassy mess with little or no flavor to the actual beer. This is a crisp, clean lager. Light grassy notes, crisp lagered notes. I can’t guarantee that this experience will ever be duplicated.
Golden colour. Light aroma, fresh hoppy taste, floral, balanced between bitterness and sweetness. Very good beer for summer.

Light, fresh and malty aroma. Fresh and light arrival followed by a distinctive bitterness that remains for quite some time. The mouth-feel is rather thin and watery though. Lighter carbonation than average in my opinion. Not extraordinary by any means, but still a good solid pilsner that goes down very easily in any situation.

Originally rated on 6/25/08. "I got this one as a single, wish i would have gotten a sixer! It pours a golden, fully carbonated body with a mid sized white cap, that left some lacing. The aroma was slightly skunky, it wasnt offensive but pleasant. Mouthfeel was full and smooth, went down easy. It tasted better as i drank it. I am not a big fan of lagers but this was a pretty good brew

Poured from an 11.2 OZ bottle into a pint glass. The appearance is a clear light golden color with a thin white head. The aroma is light malt and grass. The taste is malt with some floral hops. A good beer. The bottle cap is a plain gold color.

Typisches tschechisches Lager.
Würziger, leckerer Hopfen. Sehr kräuterig. Süße Malzbasis, nicht zu intensiv.

Aroma: grass, clover, citrusTaste: hay, cumin or herbs
Body: light and creamy
Ibu: 20
Finish: crisp, dry
Golden yellow color with small, fast deminishing white head. Aroma of herbs, grass, resin.
Fin gyllen farge, null skumtopp, lite kullsyre. Svak aroma. Litt mer fylde og smak en annen pils jeg har smakt.

Clear light yellow with white head that dissolve quikly.
Aroma: opening of light herbal hop, then come the light base malt (cereal) with hints of citrus.
Thin taste of sweet malt, little corn. Cereal and herbal aftertaste.
Light Body, average carbonation.
High drinkability for a pleasuring and refreshing light lager. One of the best industrial pilsner out there

120 years can edition - 120 B:Story. Pours golden clear with big white head. Flavour is malty, some sweet cookies with burned sugar as well. Taste is light, but follows the nose. Also some bitterness, a bit oily and some vanilla cream. Not bad for pilsener.
Color amarillo, muy poca espuma y poco duradera. Poco sabor, refrescante, carbonatada, malta. Simple.
Cerveja encorpada com um aroma levemente acentuado. Baixa acidez e amargor. Refrescante que pode ser tomada no dia a dia.

The best beer that was on offer on a day of bad beers while watching the darts at the Lakeside. Pours a golden colour with a white head. Some caramel and biscuit malt flavours and some citrus on the finish. This is quite flavoursome for a lager, but it’s still a bit on the bland side. OK but i’d hoped for something more.
11.2 oz. bottle. Purchased at Hy-Vee Omaha, 132nd and Dodge location. Pours clear golden, small white head. Aroma was sweet, pear and fruits. Taste was sweet.

On draft. Golden pour with a thick white head. Aroma of bready malts with mild hops. Flavor is crisp, clean, with a slight hop presence towards the back end. Light to medium bodied with above average carbonation. Overall. Nice.

Tap at the Aldgate. Sweetish malt nose with some light pepper and slight fruity esters. Medium body with average carbonation and a slightly creamy mouthfeel. Prickly bitterness on the finish with pepper and a hint of lemongrass.
Jemne horké chutné svetlé, dvanástka ako má byť, ležiak ktorý má niečo do seba, Budejovický zázrak

Bottle 33cl / Botella 33cl.
@ Carrefour, Sevilla, España.
A: Golden / Dorado.
T/S: Malt, sweet, slightly hoppy / Malta, dulce, ligeramente a lupulo.

0,5 l Flasche. Kräftiges Aroma, malzig süß, hopfig. Erscheinung: Dunkelgelbes Bier, flacher, grobporiger Schaum, der schnell abbaut. Geschmack: Süßlich, säuerlich, dezent bitter, recht weich. Nachgeschmack: Leicht wässrig. Gesamt: Gutes Bier, ich bin in Relation zu seinem Ruf aber etwas enttäuscht.
Bom corpo, aroma acentuado, não muita carbonatação. Lúpulo na medida certa. Excelente lager.
Kveldens siste øl, er det gode sjanser for at jeg smaker på igjen. Denne var god og smaksrik
In aroma malts, bit of hops. In taste malts, bit of hops. Big carbonation. Medium bitterness.

- bit sweet, malty taste

- a moderate hop flavor

- less buble

- medium body, with a bit sweet finish



Very drinkable.

Exemplar lager/pilsner.



________________________________
Klasyczny pilsener, słodki, mocno wysycony, lekki, na szybkie ugaszenie pragnienia, bez szału.

Zapach słodowy, nic specjalnego. Barwa złota, klarwone, Piana obfita, drobno i średniopęcherzykowa, szybko opada do niskiej warstwy, zdobi szkło. W smaku słodowe, dosyć wodniste, lekki posmak chmielu. Goryczka niska, niezbyt przyjemna, wysokie wysycenie.

Bottle. Dry and malty Bohemian pilsner, which is a good hot day beer, and generally a safe bet. Much, much better than Budweiser from InBev and a good stock beer to have if you have people round that like generic lagers but you want to give them a slight upgrade.

bottle @ Party Town / Florence KY --- Clear light golden amber color, frothy white head, lace cobwebs. Aroma is solid European Pilsner. Taste is clear malt that adds edgy carbonation on the swallow, moving from there to robust floral hops. Traditional, yes. Well done, definitely yes. A great example of the style.

Butelka. Słomkowy kolor, idealnie przejrzyste, piany brak. Aromat lekko słodowy z niewielkimi akcentem trawiastym od chmielu. W smaku te same odczucia co w aromacie. Wysycenie dość wysokie. Ogólnie piwo mało intensywne, wodniste, płaskie.

Can’t put a name to the aroma, but put it this way wouldn’t want it in a freshener 😷 colour not bad a strong golden shine but think that’s the best thing going for it! Taste not excellent, nothing there to make me wanna grab another, pass
Can 0.5l. Pours in clear pale yellow with Medium size white head. Aroma of spruce, citrus, hay. Medium bitter, medium sweet, lightly sour. Light body, thin feel, light bitter finish. Very drinkable

Pours clear gold with a bubbly but quickly fading head. Medium carbonation. Aroma is floral and malts. Taste is crisp and dry with a lightly sweet aftertaste that lingers pleasantly on the lips. Fewer hops than a typical pilsener. Light sourness near end.
Pilseners and lagers in general get a bad rap because the style lacks the complexity found in some if the other styles, but this one is an easy going, pleasant companion with some interesting notes, although not one of the best.

500ml can. Clear pale yellow body, medium white head, average retention, plenty of lacing. Aroma of mineral water, metal can, grains, hay, grass. Clear taste: grains, herbs, mineral water, a touch of hops. A tad too sweet.

Flaske. Farven er gul og skumkronen er hvid og holdbar. Aromaen er typisk for tjekkisk pilsner dvs, humlet (dejligt). Smagen er citrus og humle. Eftersmagen er bitterhumle. En typisk tjekkisk øl og de laver godt øl i Tjekkiet.

Saaz as it should be in a Pilsner. Not over the top, but fully present. Malty, but not sweet. Dry enough to be crisp and quenching.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Color reminds an apple juice - almost crystal and dark yellow. High but quickly reducing foam. Aroma is fresh, rich with honey and grass. Clear taste, with huge carbonation very dry (like champain). Palate is obvious with a bitterness in the end. Actually medium beer.

A nutty aroma with hints of malt and yeast. Pours a clear golden color with a short lasting white well laced head. A nutty crisp clean taste with a hint of malt, light body with a short lasting light malt finish.

Golden color, touch of haze. Medium carbonation. Nice malty aroma. Cookies and a touch of DMS. Nice malty character, but finishes dry. Balanced hoppiness, with a touch of acidity. Surprisingly complex. Good lager here.

Pours a clear golden beer with a standard carbonation and a small white head; Some corn and ester aromas are perceived giving it a bad first impression. The flavor has a strong alcoholic flavor and a soft and bland aftertaste, without the hop flavors expected in a pilsner beer.

Can, 50cl. Pours clear, golden colour with an 2 fingers thick off-white head with mediumsized retention and lacing. Grassy nose with hay, flowery hops, bread, corn and malty notes as well. Light-medium sweet, corny, herbal and grainy taste. Light body. Average carbonation. Well... That was okay, but dont get the hype.
Dourada, límpida. Espuma rala de curta duração. Aroma de lúpulo e gramíneas. Sabor amargo fraco, com notas de milho e grama verde. Retrogosto amargo com final adocicado.
Budweiser Budvar B:Original (Budějovický Budvar, Czech Republic ) - Overall Score: D - Below Acceptable Standard

Brilliant straw color. White 2 finger head, dead in 2 minutes. Poor legs and low activity.

Very faint sharp aromas and flavors of corn, stinky saaz, and citrus. Light body with prickly carbonation, faint but long, slightly dry, smoky bitter finish.

Overall : A Tasteless and bland craft with some basic freshness.

500 ml bottle poured at home. Pours yellow with a decent white head; little lacing. Smells like cheap beer. This is quite carbonated and has a grassy, corn taste. I was worried when I got it that it would taste like a skunky eurolager and I was on the mark. I’ll drink it but I won’t really enjoy it.
Duft intet Signe kedelig lidt malt lys, smag malt korn strå meget læt alt i alt en kedelig øl

Bottle - Clear golden colour with medium sized white head, average retention and lacing. Aroma of hay, some bread, some grassy and flowery hops. Tate is malty, some biscuit, herbal and flowery hops. Medium body, moderate carbonation, dry finish. Good, but it doesnt have the magic.
Whats happening to Budweiser? What kind of crappy name is "B:Original" anyway? This used to be a perfect Lager, its still a good one, but somehow they’re on a downhill road.
Gyllengul öl med vitt skum. Doft av gräs, hö och lätt maltighet. Detsamma i smaken. Bättre än en industrilager men inget som utmärker sig.
08-11-2015-Flasche-05,L- Strohgelber Körper mit weisser Krone. Diacethylhauch, grasig. Malzig, zitronig im Antrunk, gegen Ende leiche Hopfenbittere, Ausgewogenes Sessionbier.
On tap in Arizona, light grassy and malty. Not sweet but the malts are grainy. Thin but highly drinkable.I’m split here, I enjoyed it but it was too thin for a good czech pils.

Aroma: herbal, light corny, hoppy
Taste: light sweet, light bitter, malty, corn, herbal
Flasche und vom Fasd. Goldgelbe klare Farbe mit weissem Schaum. Malzig süsslicher Duft. Kräuter und Malz im Antrunk dann Hopfenbittere. Ein echter Klassiker.
0.5 l at a random billiard club in Zagreb. Clear golden, almost invisible white head. Fake industrial parfumed malty aroma. Light body, light carbonation. Fading sweetness. Light malty finish. Bad.

Budweiser is a good pilsner lager. Very bitter, when we taste it.
It has a good rigid foam.

Very short living white head.
Clean malt and grainy body with very light grassy hops.
Very light bitterness in the aftertaste.

Pilsner should have more hops I think.
This is an usual pale lager not bad but sad.

Bottle @ deTolly, Tartu. Pours clear golden with small white head.Aroma is sweetish, hay, malty. Taste is slightly bitter, some sweetness, malty, hay, weak caramel. Thin + body. Bitterish finish. Ok for a lager.
Vegetable aroma. Bitter start and a moderately sweet finish. Grassy and malty.

* Bottle. Pours golden, clear, with white head. 
* Aroma is medium, bread, corn & citrus. 
* Palate is light body, high carbonation, very fine bubbles. 
* Taste is medium bitter, dry, earthy & grassy. 
* Finish is earthy, bitter & slightly dry. 
* Overall bitter, dry, earthy & grassy.

3 months old can from the SAQ so pretty fresh by their standard! It pours a really clear golden with a steady stream of bubbles and a medium white head that settles into a smaller self but leave nice lacing. Nose is a little bready, fruity, some corn surely but not even near the level of other pale lagers and a little herbs. Taste is dry and moderately bitter, offers some crackery malts and some fruity hops. Crisp. Body is light and carbonation high. Mouthfeel is surprisingly not watery and the earthy bitter finish makes it really easy to drink (and you don’t feel like you’re drinking some watered down swill). Pretty nice I must say!
My overall rating is a purely mathematical amalgamate of the other ratings.

Med malty and cracker aroma, low grainy. Med low noble hops aroma. Balanced to hop aroma, less malty. Clean fermentation aroma. Low DMS and diacetyl. Gold colour, brilliant clarity. persistent white heat, with lace in the glass. Med high malty and bread flavours, low cracker and no grainy flavour. Low honey notes. Noble hops character at med intensity. Low bitterness. Balanced to malty notes. Clear fermentation profile. Malty and slightly sweet aftertaste. Low DMS. Bottle. Bad 13.07.2016/A2
Clear golden of color with a white head. An aroma of hops and cooked vegetables. A flavor of sweets, malt, hops, butter and grass.
Can. Aroma is floral, berries, hay. Taste is medium bitter, grassy, somewhat dry. Malty finish.
500ml bottle. Pours clear golden colour with a copper orange tint to it. Small white head. Hoppy aroma. Flavour of hops, sweet malts. Very drinkable.

Aroma of hops, earthy, herbal, spicy, typical Saaz hops aroma, a little skunky. Pours clear golden liquid with a medium-sized white, foamy head. In the start a little more bitter than your usual Pilsner with a distinct hops flavour, gets more sweet and citrussy later on. Light body and a slick texture with high carbonation. I would put this as an above-average Pilsner, it’s a little monotone, but not watery and still very drinkable with a nice balance of bitterness and sweetness.

Pure amber color, with some apricot shade and light foam trick light color. The aroma of malt, and is quite bright - honestly did not expect in the background a soft shade of hay - overall a very pleasant aroma.
The taste is clean, malty and round, in shades of hay and grass. At the end of soft, astringent malic acidity and aftertaste rather drawl. The apparent bitterness in beer have not noticed, grassy hops produces acidity. The body is quite dense.
Pours clear golden with low white head. Aroma of bread and citrus. Taste is sweet and malty with light bitter finish. Light, smooth body with soft carbonation.
Kräftig gelbe Farbe mäßiger Schaum, malzig schwach hopfiger Geruch, Geschmack recht flach wenig hopfig mehr süßlich

50 cl bottle from Roto dinamic, served in a snifter. Dark yellow with medium white head that quickly dissipates. Aroma is very skunky, quite unhealty, with meaty tones, only secondary aromas include malts, hopps. Body is medium, carbonation is low. Taste is on the sweet side, slightly bitter, balanced, with moderatly long finish. Texture is oily.

zapach słodowy ale też sporo kwaskowych nut, trochę kurzu. odrobina kwiatów i estrów. przyjemny, ale nie w stylu. kolor złoty, klarowny, piana przeciętna, ale ładnie koronkuje. półpełne, dość mocno kurzowe, trochę pestek z jabłek ale niewiele poza tym. goryczka niska, ale dość wyczuwalna - zioła i pestki z jabłek. nasycenie raczej niskie. bardzo średnie.

Flasche (50 cl) vom Pyongyang Shop, Pyongyang. - Schönes Goldgelb, blank, pilstypischer Schaum. - In der Nase angenehme helle Malznoten und sehr milde, schwach grasige Hopfenanklänge, dazu ein Hauch von feuchter Pappe. - Antrunk ein wenig voller malzig als bei anderen Pilsenern, mild malzsüß mit einem zart säuerlich-herben Stich. Hopfenaromen sind enttäuschend schwach und beschränken sich auf eine Andeutung von Orangenschale und Gras. Mild rezent, weiches Mundgefühl. Auch im Abgang nur milde, ein wenig vage Hopfenherbe. - Süffig und schön malzig aber enttäuschend schwach gehopft - ein typisches Massenbier halt.

The first taste was a typical lager, but quite a malty one. Finished it OK and opened the 2nd bottle and found a saltiness that had been masked. It became stronger as the bottle wore on. I declined a third one

Not a bad pilsner... But the appearance isn’t very well. Taste well with a hop finish. 

Mocno nasycone.
12 oz bottle pours golden with a white head. Aroma of grain, grass, and dough. Taste is much the same.

butelka. wszystko to, czego mozna sie spodziewac po takim piwie, czyli slodowosc, brak chmielu, wodniste. ale zarazem tez wad nijakich nie odnotowano ;) czyli jako napoj chlodzacy jest OK, jako piwo - tylko z braku laku

Ocena potraktowana skryptem do przeliczania ocen (uzgodnienie UT/RB).

Botella. Dorada clara. No demasiada espuma. Aroma cereal y un tanto metálico. En boca se nota muy carbonatada. Tiene una base amarga y deja un final seco. Bueno.... no está mal del todo (siendo de tipo industrial, claro )
Cor amarelo ouro. Carbonatação baixa. Corpo leve e refrescante, sem amargor. Leve aftertaste.
Bue en bouteille de 33cl. Belle blonde dorée, fines bulles. Bonne pils rafraichissante, houblon discret, finale forale.
Golden, medium light body, moderate carbonation. Fair hop finish but not overly bitter. Enjoyable.
Very good beer, one of the best i had ever taste. Nothing wrong i think everyone shall drink it.
From tap. Clear yellow golden color with white head. Malty grainy aroma, straw, grassy. Sweet and bitter taste. Light thin body with average carbonation.

Bottle. Appearance- golden, clear, pretty much no head, archetypal lager. Aroma- malts, cereal, hoppy, hint of spice, citrus fruits. Taste- grassy, floral, crisp hops, some spicy malt, straw, lemon hints, smooth mouthfeel, refreshing finish. Nice.
Aromat maślany, ale nie odrzucający. Dość pełne jak na lagera w smaku, wrażenie to podkreślone przez diacetyl.

500ml can from Drinks of the World 
 
Clear light golden with medium sized white head, some lacing. Aroma of malts, straw and doughy. Taste of straw, doughy, grainy and citrus 
 
Decent
----- I’ve tried it before joining to the RateBeer. -----
On tap.  Mild-weiches, süffiges Bier. Ein Hauch Würze, dazu mild-getreidig mit einem moderat bitteren, leicht süßlichem Nachgeschmack. Frisch und süffig, sortentypisch und weich-rund.
Clean golden color, medium white head. Aroma of malt, grain, grassy hops. Dry sweet taste with mild hoppy bitterness in finish. Thin body and good carbonation. Fine lager.

Tap at Brutal Assault. When tapped properly, with one pull and at correct temperature, this can be a pretty acceptable summer lawn mower beer. Thin watery mouthfeel, light flavours, balance of rather light bitterness and a hint of malt. Okay industrial beer. With improper tapping technique it can easily change into worthless piss. I am rating at the positive side of spectrum.

Beautiful golden pour with lively carbonation, looks very crisp, modest head. A: lovely aroma of pilsener malts, bitter, some citrus notes. T: crisp, but not as crisp as Urquel. Starts with a mellow malty bitterness. Bitter fruity development, mostly apples. Very gentle mouthfeel, nice. Aftertaste is a bit sweet, dry, malty, some wheat notes. Lovely thirst quencher with perfect bitterness.

Tap@Taphouse, Copenhagen (16/07/2015) - pours golden yellow with a white head. Aroma and taste is grassy and grainy, straw, hay, crisp and light on the palate, medium to light in body, with a clean crisp bitter finish.

The beer has a typical pilsener appearance. The beer has a pale yellow color and little foam. The smell has some barley, together with a tiny roast aroma. The taste is nice. It has a little tropical sourness, caused by the hops. The beer is very tasteful. There is a nice bitterness and a little alcohol touch. Nice.

Aroma: cooked vegetables, basement aromas, 
Appearance: pale, clear, minimal head, sparkling
Taste: light sweetness, lightly bitter
Palate: light body, lively, bitter
Overall: solid lager

Pours a deeper golden bronze than the USA knock off. Head is white that leaves some lacing and quickly dissipates. Nose is dominated by the malt. Tate has a touch of sweetness - ever so little. It’s followed by the earthiness of the malt and hops. Mouthfeel is good with a medium light body. It is far better than the USA knock off. 11.2 oz bottle
330 ml bottle @ 5.0%. A fine well balanced Lager that is not too sweet and has great mouth feel. Hard to put down with the grassy hops.
.5l from refrigerated bottle. Pretty tasty. Refreshing and crisp. Lightly malty, a hint of bitterness. Clean, overall, without too much taste.
One of the best pilseners I have tasted in a long time, little in bitterness but strong in carbon dioxide. Sweet taste and taste for more. Nice after bite.

Bottle. Golden-yellow colored with some orange. Clear and sparkling with a white frothy head. Hoppy smell, fruity with floral notes, hints of grapes and some bready malts. Pleasantly medium bitter balanced by light sweetness. Flavor is fruity and floral as well. Body is light to medium with high carbonation. Well balanced and harmonic in aroma and taste with a nice bitter finish and pleasantly light but long aftertaste.
Pours a golden color with a white head. A very refreshing beer with a subtle biscuit flavor.
Taste is really good. Palate is really good. Aroma is really good too. Of course its not perfect but it has very good taste

A nice svetly that quenches your thirst and tastes good. Quite simple really. Minimal hop character, it?s mostly bready and grassy. Light body, thin and fizzy with a somewhat abrupt dry hoppy finish. Not the best,but satisfying.

Złote, klarowne piwo o średnio obfitej pianie, która szybko redukuje się do zera. Aromat słodowo-ziołowy, ale trochę za mało intensywny. W smaku słód i wyczuwalna chmielowość, ale wszystko to na zdecydowanie za niskim poziomie jak dla mnie. Goryczka niska, ale na języku pozostaje po przełknięciu przyjemne szczypanie. Ogólnie tragedii nie ma, ale spodziewałem się czegoś bardziej chmielowego, a jest to tylko jeden poziom wyżej niż przeciętny koncerniak.

Drank on the train from Berlin to Dresden Pours clear golden with a white fizzy head. Classica aroma of a Czech Pilsner, with Saaz hops dominating. Mild lemongrass and spicy notes. Taste is medium bitter well balanced with cereally hints. Very clean, distinctive tasting beer. Highly refreshing, straight-forward and solid Pilsner.

Tuoksun perusteella ei melkein huomaisi, että lasissa on mitään. Vaahtoa muodostui hieman ja väri on kauniin vaalean kullanruskea. Maussa on hitunen hunajaa ja maltaisuutta. Hiilihappoisuus on juuri sopivan pehmeää ja jotain rapeutta löytyy. Ei tästä juuri muuta sanottavaa, suoraviivainen eikä juurikaan mieleenpainuva olut.

Cerveja ícone entre as pilsener apresentou líquido dourado,límpido,translúcido,formação de espuma mediana que manteve uma fina camada até o final;no aroma malte e o delicioso perfume dos lúpulos Saaz;sabor inicial maltado com notas de mel e casca de laranja,lúpulo aparecendo no final dando um retrogosto seco levemente amargo,media carbonatação,corpo leve,frescante,alta drinkability,equilibradíssima,recomendo.
Smelled of skunk and light malt. Body is very crisp and dry. It has a mild lingering bitterness.
Koliko sam puta popio ovo pivo .. i pravi iz ceske i ovaj novi koji je u hrvatskoj .. nista posebno .. ne pijem ga vise ...
Hay flavor and hops dominate the taste. Oily body and a beautiful color. Everything is on the front end as it finishes clean and dry.
Pours golden yellow, slight hazy and with a white head. Aroma is classic pilsener malt with a corn note. Flavour is soft malty, slight sweet with a good bitterness into the finish.

12 oz bottle best by 11/23/15.
 Clear, brilliant golden, lively carbonation, creamy white head, spotty lace.
Aroma is bready malts and spicy hops.
Flavor is similar, sweet bready malts and mildly spicy hops. Less hoppy than Urquell, but still nice.
European style Lager...16.9 oz bottle at Red June. Similar to Stella..................

Amarelo vivo, espuma branca de pouca duração. Aroma herbal, gramíneas, média intensidade. Paladar de amargor médio, muito fácil de beber. Aftertaste intensifica um pouco do amargor, mas sem exageros. Referência de estilo.
Helder geel bier met weinig schuim. Smaak is vlak, licht bitter hoppig en komt wat waterig over. Stelt teleur.

Honey, grass and a hint of malt and floral hops in the aroma. Golden with a white head. Medium sweet and light to medium bitter. Light to medium body with a average to soft carbonation. Overall an OK Pilsener, not interesting in any way, but slightly above average.
Draught at brewfellas. Pours clear golden colour with a white head. A very refreshing lager
12 ounce bottle from Arthur shop, Tel aviv. Pours yellow with taste of apple and light sweet. Yup. Lager.Not sure if it is worse or better than American Bud.

so i watched the beerhunter episode on czech beer. i really had no idea there were two separate budweisers. its a great series tbh and has some surprisingly informative bits. so i nabbed this from tesco tonight just to see how different it was. its golden with a foamy white head, nice aroma of hay and malts. tastes crisp, has good rounded malty body with a wee hoppy bite at the end. just a tasty lager. way better than the other pish
Sweetness is all about this beer. Golden, sweet and easy to drink. A summer thing. Decent.
Clear golden with a medium white head. Aroma is grassy, flowers and citrus. Taste is hops and citrus.

(330 ml bottle, Beijing. original review June 20, 2015. 2.8) 
(500 ml bottle, Berlin. Feb 5, 2020. 2.9)

Aroma: Sweet and sour, maltiness, some hops. 2) Sightly sweet/dank malt, hint of bread/dough. 4->4
Appearance: nice looking beer with moderate head. good color for a lager/pilsner. 2) respectable initial head, does fade a bit fast to almost nothing, as before, nice color for a lager/pils, tad orangey/honey yellow. 4->3
Taste: Rich lager taste, some yeast and bread, tartness, moderate bitterness. Not as hoppy as top-notch pilsners. 2) solid graininess, toast and bread crust, enough pilsy hops bitterness on the finish. 5->6
Palate: Clean, tart, simple but enjoyable. 2) light to medium light, crisp, slightly creamy and well balanced. 3->3

Overall: Definitely better than American Bud, but not as good as Urquell. 2) solid beer, a bit weak upfront and not super complex in flavor, but solid grain and pils hoppiness. a couple notches above some cheap mass-market euro lager. 12->13
Daje radę. Aromat chmielowy bez narzucającego się dms-u. Z wyglądu słomkowe, piana słaba. W smaku jest przyzwoicie - goryczka wyczuwalna i zalegająca, fajna słodowa kontra. Takie pilsy lubię.
0,5l can. Golden color small white head. Very nice aroma, malt and fresh hops. Taste malty, citrus, smooth body, pretty light hoppy finish. Little to sweet for me, but quite good beer.

Aromat: delikatny chmielowy. Barwa: jasnosłomkowa, klarowna. Piana: średnio-obfita. Wysycenie: średnio-wysokie. Smak: na początku zbożowa słodowość, potem lekka chmielowa goryczka. Mało ciała. Podsumowując, mimo słabego aromatu i "ugrzecznionego" smaku, piwo to jest całkiem niezłe, szczególnie na letnie upały.
This is a great beer. Have drank it a number of times in Vancouver. If you want a consistent great tasting lager this is the one.
Dorada media, pajiza. Poca burbuja. Espuma mínima y poco consistente. Aroma nulo. En boca cuerpo medio, con sabor algo metálico, predominando cereal.

Hopsy taste. Delicate balance between bitterness and sweetness. A little bit of floral taste. Medium body, average carbonation. A great summer beer from the Czechs. One of my favourite pilsners. Would recommend!

Butelka 500ml, termin do : 5.11.2015, - zakupiony na Słowacji w Bratysławie,
Nie ma co się rozwodzić nad tym piwem i rozkładać go na czynniki. Od lat niezmienny praktycznie taki sam z tym co jest w Polsce...

50cl bottle. Pours golden color with medium white head and poor lacing. Almost no smell. Taste is sweet, malty and hoppy. Medium bitterish aftertaste.
Mediocre beer.

Very Amber in appearance. Heavyish taste. Very nice and from Germany from a friend.

Pours clear golden color with a 2-finger white head. Earthy, grassy aroma, with maybe a touch of lemon. Body is light and a touch watery. Lightly dry finish. Flavor is grassy mixed with an earthy, yeasty note.

Pours a clear golden color, topped with a very nice fluffly white head. Grassy aroma with some floral notes is easy to pick up. Taste is clean, crisp. Mild floral sweetness at first, grassy with medium hoppy bitterness. Great refreshment beer.

Bottled from Supermarket. Not much smell to it, smells bready with a bit of grass. Beauitful clear pale honey colour with a nice white head. Crisp light sweet medium bitter taste. Light body, thin texture, lively carbonation, and abrupt finish. A very crisp, very drinkable lager that has that something more to it than your standard crap.
12oz bottle. Disappearing white-gold. A-sweet lt malt. T-sweet honey/sugar-lt malt, some spice hops.

This beer is becoming too industrial. Of course it is better than a poor heineken and it is still a pils but a bit to sweet for me. The colour is nice like gold and the carbonation is regular. My biggest critic is that they cut the quality of hop, if I compare with this product 15 years ago.

I am rather shocked, that website specializing in rating beer and collecting opinion worldwide can’t even do its own home work. This beer is celebrating 120 years of brewing this year! NOT 720 YEARS AS YOR ARTICLE STATES RIGHT UPFRONT!!! The % alcohol by volume is 5.

From a bottle. Not my favourite style, malty and well balanced, smooth and drinkable.
Bottle. Distinct aroma (saaz hops, grain) from other pilseners. Light yellowish color, clear, watery look. Medium bitterness. Good pilsener.
Im Glas schöne, lang anhaltende Perligkeit, in der Nase malzig, etwas maischig. Im Trunk ausgewogen malzig-bitter. Wenig Abgang - gutes Pils.

Bottle 0.5l. Clear light golden with small white head. Sweetish aroma with notes of honey and some herbs. Clean and sweetish flavor, floral, somewhat sugary, notes of herbs and honey, light sourness and light bitterness. Soft carbonation, light-bodied.
Light golden appearance with little head. Tastes of honey, citrus strong malts and is relatively complex to be a larger
SB Lund, flaska. En bra pilsner. Trots flaskans resa genom Sauronbolagets varma ljusa sataniska trista lokaler.
Decent pilsner. Light with that classic pilsner taste that can be a real treat on a hot day.
Appena inferiore alla urquell, è comunque una buona birra da pasto, ha tutte le caratteristiche della pils ceche.

Pours perfectly clear, nice carbonation levels, not overly gassy as macro stuff tends to be.

Aroma showcases the typical Czech Svetly one. This is one of the standards in it´s class.

Taste is very rich malt, very crisp and light to drink.

Bottle from SB.
Böhmischer Standard. Süßlich, voll, malzig. Bloß nicht abwechselnd mit Pils oder so trinken. – Sehr gekonntes Etikett, kernige Farbenkombi.

Golden colored, medium strong white non lasting head. Aroma is of pils malt, some diacetyl, noble hops. Taste is medium sweet pils malt, bit of diacetyl, low to medium noble/grassy hops and light+ bitterness. Low to medium bodied, medium carbonation.
Origin: Bottle. Vessel: Pint Glass. Supplier: Tesco (Bristol). Pours a weak gold. Light and highly carbonated.

Wypite w firmowej knajpie w Czeskich Budziejowicach. Kolor złoty, klarowny. Piana obfita .Aromat drożdży, lekko cytrynowe, przyprawy ziołowe.Piwo średnio wytrawne, przyjemna intensywna goryczka. Piwo super.

ok pils

Pours clear golden with short-lived white head. Nice herbal aroma, grassy and earthy aswell. Taste is light bitter, light malty. Light body, easy drinking. Nice session beer.
Golden colour with white head. Aroma of hops and some spices. The same is flavour with well balanced carbonation and bitterness. Medium body, good taste and hoppy finish. Good pilsner.
One of the greatest beers! Just everything is right about this brew. Thank you!!!

Budvar on väriltään vaalean kultaista ja kirkasta. Tuoksussa on maltaisuutta ja humalan katkeruutta. Lasiin kaadettaessa muodostaa kestävän vaalean vaahdon. Suutuntumaltaan Budvar on raikkaan kevyt ja hiilihappoinen, jonka vuoksi tämä käy myös janojuomasta. Maussa on samanlaista miellyttävää humalan katkeroa ja maltaisuutta kuin Pilsner Urquellissa, mutta miedompana. Jälkimaussa päällimmäiseksi nousee myös mieto katkeruus. Budvar muistuttaa suutuntumaa lukuunottamatta kuin hieman miedommaksi tehtyä Pilsner Urquellia. Mikäli haet peruslageria enemmän luonnetta, muttet ole valmis voimakkaampiin, tämä saattaa olla kokeilemisen arvoinen. Mielestäni aavistuksen tyyris laatuunsa nähden.
Bottle pour. Clear golden body with a thin head. Aroma and taste are classic pilsner. Very refreshing. Enjoyed it very much.

Aroma: bread,floral,alcohol. Appearance: pale, clear, white foam, head disappears fast. Taste: medium bitterness, lightly sour. Palate: light body, thin feel, average carbonation, light bitter finish.

Light grainy malt aroma with a bite. Clear golden body with a light thin head. Taste a also of a light grain malt that has a faint sweetness. Average carbonated. Crisp and refreshing. More authentic taste than most macro pale lagers.
Cerveja dourada, brilhante, maltada.....boa aparência e sabor. Uma Pilsner para o dia a dia.
330 ml bottle. Clear golden with white head. Smell is grain and grassy, herbal hops. Taste is light grain with herbal and grass hops. Dry with medium bitterness and medium carbonation.
How: Can Appearance: Almost clear golden color, large white head. Aroma: Cheese, sweet oranges, wet grass, vegetables. Palate: light body, average carbonation.
16.5.2014. Like basic lager but somehow purer and more malts. Some grass, citrus, grain.

Pours golden yellow from bottle with minimal head. Aroma of fresh grass, tangy. Malty, citrus flavor with dry, nasal aftertaste (Saaz hops?). Light-medium body with medium carbonation. Overall drinkable, could do with more head retention, not my favorite class and comparable to some of the better American light lagers.

piana obfita,szybko znikajaca,nasycenie duze,typowe dla tego typu lagerow,kolor slomkowy,w zapachu slod i jablkowy zapach,w smaku rowniez jablka,slod i wyrazna,przyjemna goryczka,typowy i poprawny przedstawiciel swojego stylu
Bottle from Sainsburys Team Valley. Nice enough standard lager - little bit of a zing on first taste but that fades pretty fast

0,5L can. Pours clear golden with white head. The head stays. Aroma is sweet, malty, and grainy. Flavor is very smooth, sweet, malts, grains and some vegetable notes. Finish has some mild bitterness. Light body, but not watery. Overall: not a fan of the style, but this one is really easy to drink.

Copenhagen 13/9 2014. 50 cl can from Føtex. Red and white can with a Coat of Arms of České Budêjovice. 

Pours clear yellow with a mid-sized white head. Dissipates quite quickly leaving a thin patchy layer of foam behind. Moderate lacing.

Aroma is medium intense with a light sweet, malty odor. Sourish grains. Grass, lemon and a little bit of metal.

Medium strong carbonation. Thin, watery, lively and tingling texture. 

Flavor is medium intense with a medium strong sweetness followed by a stronger bitterness. Aftertaste is bitter with a subtle sour twist. Lingers for a while. 

Decent Czech pilsner.

Can from The Green Dragon, Leek (JDW) Pours a clear golden colour with a fizzy white head. Aroma of sweet grain, honey, grass and subtle banana. Taste of sweet grain and caramel malt plus grassy and spicy hops. Light bodied and moderate carbonation. Little bitterness in the finish. A pretty good Czech Pilsner.
Bottle .33. Hoppy and malty aroma. Lively carbonation with small head. Malty and hoppy flavor. Properly floral with dry finish. Classic.
500ml can. Clear golden with a frothy white head. Flavors are crackers, grass and citrus with floral notes. Light body, good carbonation, slick texture.
Barwa złota, piwo klarowne. Piana na początku bardzo obfita, ale szybko się podziurawiła i zniknęła. W aromacie przede wszystkim słód, podobnie jak w smaku. Goryczka raczej niewielka.
Klarowne, czyste w aromacie, przyjemna goryczka to cechy tego udanego piwa.

Skunk (green) bottle, Scotland. Pours light amber with a nice head, quickly diminishing. Scent is strong of malt and hops. Taste is full-bodied pilsner. Medium density, slightly sweet. Palette is minutely syrup, but smooth and inviting. One of my favorite pilsners.

Second review: bottle at GBK. Medium dark golden with loads of lacing maintaining a good head. Scent is mild tinny metal. Taste is medium sweet Pilsen with continued froth. Finish is clean and peppery. Good, needs work.
Bottle. 0,5L. Price: 0,85€. Geras, skanus, alus. Galima naudoti dažniau ...

Wanted to like this so much before opening, but although better than its american namesake it just doesn't deliver on taste or appearance. Better than the american stuff but so so retried it's actually very decent what was I thinking

BB 19.08.2015. Poured a crystal clear amber colour with 5mm of white foam that diminished rapidly to a collar that laced poorly. Carbonation low and coarse. Aroma is malty with no obvious hops and typical of a lager. Taste of slight sweetness and a slight hops bitterness. Light body. Smooth, crisp, refreshing but one to drink quickly to enjoy the best it has to offer.
Recent batches imported in to Estonia are rather flat, and dull. Usually a more fuller body, and cleaner nose.

"King of Beers." Ha! Worst beer I’ve ever had. Well, I had the American version in a can once. That was worse. But I had to drink this since I’m watching US soccer play Panama now. Sam Adams would have been a better choice to represent America, but you can only get it at KaDeWe here and that is far away. MURICA!!!

Pours a clear light amber topped by a vivid white head that quickly dissipates and leaves some traces of lacing. The nose is mostly herbal and leafy as is the taste. Some grainy come through but we can see the hops are the main event here with a light herbal feature lasting all the way from start to finish. Simple and delicate, this brew is crisp and very drinkable. Cheers!
Bottle(7-Feb-2015)Light grass malt aroma.Clear amber,low head&poor suds lace.Light herbal malt flavour.Wheat herbal light malt&cherry grass aftertaste.
Herbal hop spice aroma. Clear Amber colour fair head and lacing. Malt herbal hop flavour. Smooth palate.
Kvalitné suroviny, obstojná chuť, jeden z najlepších vo veľkom vyrábaných ležiakov na československom trhu.

Thought I might rate the 2 Budweisers back to back. I wonder which will be better? 330ml bottle into glass. Earthy hop nose, slight malt. Clear golden colour with small white head. Medium body & carbonation. Nice crisp hop finish. Obviously better than the American Bud but different styles.
Perfectly clear golden straw colored beer. Light aroma of malt and lager yeast. Soft texture and crisp hop flavor. Easy drinking and good for the sauna.
Butelka. Barwa złota, przejrzyste. Piana obfita zanika. Aromat chmielowy, słodowy. W smaku słodkawe, goryczka średnia ku niskiej, dość krótka. Piwo wysoko nasycone, pijalne.

Amarelo dourado, brilhante, boa e persistente espuma. Aroma floral do lúpulo, pão, doce do diacetil. Na boca o amargor é bem agradável, pouco intenso. Aftertaste refrescante, levemente adocicado e amargo. Corpo médio-baixo.
500ml can. Clear and golden. Minimal head, vanishing fast. Aroma bit hoppy. Light sweet taste, but not very prominent.
Clear golden with big dissipating head. Aroma is cereal, floral and some spicy notes. Aftertaste is dry, floral and some sweet malt. Overall: Well made. Prefer Urquell more.

Cerveza de color amarillo dorado con una cabeza blanca.
Aroma a malta con notas de lúpulos.

0,5 pullo@ Barona- areena. Kirkkaan kullankeltainen. Tuoksussa mallasta, humalaa, vähän pistävä. Maussa mallasta, maalaisleipää, humalaa. Pehmeä ja varsin kevyt, mutta ei vetinen.

Clear light and golden, small white head that disappears very quickly. Moderately strong aroma, grainy, slightly herb like, moderately hoppy. Taste is very slightly sweet with a slight bitter aftertaste but overall the taste is not prominent. okt a little dull

ENG: 500ml Czechvar bottle (NorAm version) purchased at Liquor Mart, Winnipeg. Drank in glass. Very light golden color with almost no - white-tan - head. There were some fuzzles in the liquid. It’s hard to say a lot about the aroma and taste, since it’s very low of them. This beer is sour and malty in both aroma and taste. I can also feel the alcohol which maybe isn’t really much, but also is not an enjoyable feeling. There might be some bitterness but it’s almost imperceptible. This is a typical commercial brewery lager / pils type of beer - boring and shallow. Good if you wanna get drunk, or when you’re thirsty, but nothing else. ///!!!/// ///!!!/// ///!!!/// ///!!!/// ///!!!/// ///!!!/// ///!!!/// ///!!!/// ///!!!/// ///!!!/// PL: Butelka 500ml z Północno Amerykańskiej wersji eksportowej zakupiona w Liquor Mart w Winnipeg. Wypite ze szklanki. Kolor bardzo jasno-złoty praktycznie zero piany (która pojawiła się podczas nalewania, miała jasny niemal biały kolor). Dużo fusów. Ciężko cokolwiek o tym piwie opowiadać. Zarówno aromat jak i smak nie mają zbyt wiele do zaoferowania. Kwaśność i słód są mocno wyczuwalne w aromacie jak i smaku. Czuć również smak alkoholowy, może nie bardzo mocno, ale na pewno nie jest to przyjemne.Jest pewna goryczka ale ledwo wyczuwalna. Jest to lager / pils typowy dla koncerniaków - nudny i płytki w doznaniach smakowych. Dobry na imprezę lub dla zaspokojenia pragnienia w ciepłe letnie dni.
Famous name, but nowadays an ordinary beer. It is probably time to ask ourselves why well known beers from the former East are not so good anymore like in the time of communism.

0,5 l bottle. Clear, golden yellow with a small, soapy, white head. Weak, grassy aroma with hints of cereals and grass. Slightly bitter taste of grass, hay and cereals. Thin body, flat carbonation, short and only slightly bitter finish. Very thin, slightly watery with very little aroma and taste. Solid pilsener and good thirst quencher but still boring.

12 oz bottle into a pint glass.

A: Pours a golden straw color. There isn’t much head - about a fingers worth, white color, and with poor retention. It isn’t exactly much to look at, but it has a nice color.

S: Lightstruck, sadly. Less sadly, it’s not irredeemably lightstruck. There are some nicely sweet malt notes (not overdone) along with a slight grassy tickle. Damn green bottles, this aroma could have been something good without the skunk.

T: Since it’s a pilsner, it’s fairly simplistic. And that’s forgivable. It starts with sweet malt and a faint bubblegum note, while the finish is bitter and grassy just as I like it. It’s really hitting the spot in all the right ways.

M: It’s a bit on the sweet side, but the finishing bitterness cleanses the palate nicely. That, and the fizzy carbonation. It might be 5% less drinkable than I like from the style, but who cares?

O: Give me a pitcher of this, and I’ll be set...for about 15 minutes. Thank cripes this comes in cans too, because green bottles. In the right mood and setting, I’d drink this over BCBS even.

ピルスナー？チェコビール  
飲みやすい。スッキリ、甘くないし、美味しい

Pale golden color, clear; lasting white head - aroma: grains, cereals, some grassy hops - taste is slightly sweet and slightly bitter - light to medium body, thin to oily texture, average carbonation - long grainy finish.

I’m confused by the name game on the can. Beer is a bit of a let down. Almost lifeless in its hopping & the finish lacks that pilsner smack to the mouth that I enjoy. Feels like this can is old, sitting in boats & warehouses & shelves while other more exciting beer is being brewed elsewhere.

Blonde pale légèrement dorée, beaucoup de bulle, léger col de mousse blanche. Nez de malts et de miel. Bouche maltée, légèrement houblonnée, épicée. Gentille amertume, bien sucrée. Buvable sans plus...
Golden clear. Minimal and brief head. Light floral and grass aroma. Bitterness is nearly nice. Thin and maybe oily texture. Does it finish at all?

Bottle. Pours golden with small white head. Nice grassy hops, malt and skunk(green bottle) in aroma. Taste too malty sweet, low bitterness, thin shade of hops. Due to its maltiness quite heavy to drink. Really, years ago it was much better!

12pz bottle (North American) in snifter. Golden hue nice head skunky aroma. 
Good skunky lager. Not near as good as I remember it in Poland (room temp from grocery store). But I might have been really thirsty.

Easy and light beer that is good enjoying bootle after bootle!!!!!!!!! :) :) :) :)

Flaska på jägers - Fin gyllene färg. Klassisk lager arom. Försiktig sötma och en viss beska.
